9bde591cc5.gt:
In a large skillet, brown the ground meat and drain off any grease.
Add the chopped onion and cook for about 3 minutes, until the onions are softened.
Add the cabbage and water and cook for about 5 minutes, or until the cabbage starts to wilt.
Add the tomatoes, brown sugar, vinegar, salt, caraway seed and garlic.
Bring to a boil, reduce heat and cover.
Simmer until the cabbage is cooked to the desired tenderness, about 30 minutes.
Serve with white rice.
9bde591cc5.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the ground beef, onion, egg, bread crumbs, and seasonings. Mix well.
3. Roll the ground beef mixture into small meatballs.
4. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the meatballs and cook until they are browned on all sides.
5. Remove the meatballs from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, add some more oil and cook the onions until they are soft and translucent.
7. Add the cabbage and cook until it is tender.
8. Add the cooked meatballs back to the skillet and stir to combine.
9. In a separate bowl, mix together the casserole ingredients: the cooked cabbage mixture, the uncooked rice, and the milk.
10. Pour the casserole mixture over the meatballs in the skillet, and stir to combine.
11. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 30 minutes, or until the casserole is hot and bubbly.
12. Serve the Unstuffed Cabbage Roll Casserole hot.

[/INST]

e1cc65aa99.gt:
Grease 9 x 13 inch pan.
Heat syrup, butter and morsels to boiling stirring constantly.
Remove from heat, stir in vanilla.
Pour over cereal in bowl, toss until coated.
Fold in marshmallows 1 cup at a time.
Press into pan with buttered back of spoon.
Let stand 1 hour.
Cut into 2 inch squares.
Store at room temperature.
e1cc65aa99.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the Golden Grahams cereal, marshmallows, and melted butter. Mix until the marshmallows are evenly coated.
3. Press the mixture into a square or rectangular baking dish, making sure to press it evenly and firmly.
4. Bake the mixture in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until the edges are slightly golden and the marshmallows are melted and slightly toasted.
5. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
6. Using a sharp knife, cut the cooled square into equal squares.
7. Serve the Golden Graham Cereal S'mores Squares immediately, or store them in an airtight container for later enjoyment.

[/INST]

f3de3243b2.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F. Cut twelve 1/2 slices on the diagonal from the baguette.
Lay them out on a baking sheet and lightly brush the tops with olive oil and sprinkle with black pepper.
Bake for 10-15 minutes or until golden-brown.
When done remove the pan from the oven and set it aside.
Meanwhile, cook the bacon in a skillet over medium heat until crispy.
When done, set bacon aside on a paper towel-lined plate.
Very thinly slice the brie and set aside.
Cut the peaches in half and remove the pit.
Lay the halves flat-side down and cut into 1/4 thick slices.
Heat a grill pan over medium-high and lightly coat with cooking spray.
Grill the peaches for no more than 60 seconds on each side, brushing lightly with balsamic vinegar.
Place a piece of brie on each crostini, followed by half a piece of bacon and a peach slice.
Arrange them on a platter, sprinkle with chopped basil, and serve.
Makes 12 crostini.
f3de3243b2.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Cut the peaches into bite-sized pieces and remove the pit.
3. Cut the bacon into small pieces.
4. Spread the brie cheese on the crostini.
5. Place the peach pieces on top of the brie cheese.
6. Top the peaches with the bacon pieces.
7. Drizzle the crostini with a touch of honey.
8. Place the crostini on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Serve the warm crostini immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Peach, Bacon, & Brie Crostini!

4c06a6e6ee.gt:
Mix the sugar and Boric Acic well.
Add the warm water slowly, mixing all the while so it won't be too lumpy.
Store in a jar.
When ready to use, put cotton into the top of a jar lid to fill it, and then saturate the cotton to the top.
Place where you want it; make several if you need it.
Will keep for a long while.
NOTE: I usually drip a drop or two over the edge of the lid to rest on the counter so they will find it sooner.
It sometimes takes a little while for them to find it, but find it they will.
When they do, let them alone; you will want to kill them because they look so creepy; but don't because they will hang over the edge of the lid and drink, drink, drink, and then take it back to the nest.
Almost over night, they will be gone.
4c06a6e6ee.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Add the eggs, milk, and melted butter to the dry ingredients, stirring until smooth.
4. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pan.
5. Bake the cake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
6. Allow the cake to cool for a few minutes in the pan, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
7. While the cake is cooling, prepare the frosting by mixing the butter, cream cheese, and vanilla extract until smooth.
8. Once the cake is fully cooled, spread the frosting evenly over the top and sides of the cake.
9. Decorate the cake with the crushed cookies, if desired.
10. Refrigerate the cake for at least an hour before serving.

Enjoy your delicious-looking Get Rid of Ants, Ants, Ants cake!

cfc57858dc.gt:
Chill a serving bowl in the freezer while you make the salsa.
In a mixing bowl, combine the chopped green chiles, onion, green olives, and black olives.
Lightly mix in the Cheddar cheese and tomatoes; season to taste with garlic salt and black pepper.
If desired, mix in a little bit of the olive brine.
Serve in the chilled bowl.
cfc57858dc.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- 1 cup of olive oil
- 1/2 cup of lemon juice
- 1/2 cup of grated Parmesan cheese
- 1/2 cup of chopped fresh parsley
- Salt and pepper to taste

2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. In a small bowl, mix the olive oil, lemon juice, and grated Parmesan cheese. Season with salt and pepper to taste.
4. Spread the olive dip mixture evenly over a baking sheet.
5. Cut the bread into small, bite-sized pieces.
6. Place the bread pieces on the baking sheet, making sure they are evenly distributed.
7. Bake the bread in the preheated oven for 10-12 minutes, or until the bread is golden brown and crispy.
8. Remove the bread from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the olive dip bread as a snack or appetizer.

Please note that the steps provided are general guidelines and may vary depending on the specific recipe or individual preferences.

21827f90ac.gt:
Bring carrots and cauliflower to boil in 1 inch water in Dutch oven or large deep skillet; cover.
Cook 2 min.
Add broccoli; cook, covered, 3 to 5 min.
or until vegetables are crisp-tender.
Meanwhile, heat oil in small saucepan on medium-high heat.
Add onions; cook and stir 1 min.
Add cream cheese product and milk; cook and stir 2 to 3 min.
or until cream cheese is completely melted and mixture is well blended, stirring frequently.
Drain vegetables; place in bowl.
Top with cream cheese sauce.
21827f90ac.pred:
1. Preparation:
- Wash and chop the vegetables into bite-sized pieces.
- Heat a pan or skillet over medium heat.
- Add a small amount of oil and cook the vegetables until they are tender but still crisp.
- Season the vegetables with salt and pepper to taste.

2. Sauce:
- In a small bowl, mix together cream cheese, sour cream, and a pinch of salt.
- Add minced garlic and chopped onion to the cream cheese mixture.
- Stir until the ingredients are well combined.
- Gradually add a small amount of milk, stirring constantly, until the sauce reaches the desired consistency.

3. Combination:
- Add the sauce to the cooked vegetables in the pan or skillet.
- Stir gently to combine the sauce with the vegetables.
- Cook for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sauce has thickened slightly and the vegetables are coated evenly.

4. Serving:
- Serve the cooked vegetables with the creamy chive and onion sauce over rice or noodles.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy veggie dish!

12da18d9e5.gt:
In a large pot, cook the wheat berries according to the package directions.
Set aside and let cool to room temperature.
In a medium bowl, whisk together the apple cider vinegar, orange juice, salt, pepper, nutmeg, cinnamon, olive oil and lemon juice.
Set aside.
In a large bowl, toss the cooked wheat berries, Goji berries, apple, celery, scallions, parsley and pecans together until combined.
Pour half the dressing over the salad and stir thoroughly.
Cover and refrigerate for at least 1 hour.
Prior to serving, pour the remaining dressing over the salad and toss to combine.
Serve immediately or store in the refrigerator for up to 5 days.
12da18d9e5.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the wheat berries, cherries, and walnuts.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the dressing ingredients: lemon juice, olive oil, honey, mustard, salt, and pepper.
4. Pour the dressing over the wheat berry mixture and toss to coat evenly.
5. Transfer the salad to a baking dish and bake for 30-40 minutes, or until the wheat berries are tender and the dressing is slightly crispy.
6. Serve the salad immediately, and enjoy!

This recipe card provides clear instructions for preparing a delicious Wheat Berry Waldorf Salad with Citrus Vinaigrette. The dish is easy to follow and can be enjoyed as a healthy and flavorful meal.

9008821dbd.gt:
In large bowl, whisk together oil and lime juice.
Add cilantro, cumin, salt and pepper to taste, mixing well.
Stir in beans, bell pepper, corn, onion, and jalapeno pepper.
Taste and adjust seasoning.
To serve, garnish with cilantro sprigs.
Serve at room temperature.
9008821dbd.pred:
To prepare the meal, you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 can of black beans
- 1 can of kidney beans
- 1 can of corn
- 1 bell pepper (red, yellow, or orange)
- 1/2 cup of chopped red onion
- 1/2 cup of chopped cilantro
- 1/4 cup of lime juice
- 1/4 cup of olive oil
- Salt and pepper to taste
- Optional: 1/4 cup of sour cream or yogurt

First, rinse the beans and corn thoroughly. Then, drain the beans and corn, and transfer them to a large mixing bowl.

Next, chop the bell pepper into small pieces, and add them to the bowl.

Add the chopped red onion, cilantro, and lime juice to the bowl. Mix the ingredients well.

Add salt and pepper to taste, and mix again.

If desired, add sour cream or yogurt to the bowl and mix well.

Serve the Fiesta Bean Salad immediately or refrigerate it for later use.

Enjoy your delicious and healthy meal!

13da1b6a5b.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F.
Coat a pie pan with cooking spray.
Heat a medium nonstick skillet coated with cooking spray over medium heat.
Cook the scallions, bell pepper, and bacon for 3 minutes, or until softened.
Spoon into the prepared pie pan.
Top with the Cheddar.
In a large bowl combine the milk, egg substitute, mustard, and nutmeg.
Pour into the pie pan.
Sprinkle with the Parmesan.
Bake for 35 minutes, or until golden and a knife inserted in the center comes out clean.
13da1b6a5b.pred:
As a helpful language and vision assistant, I can provide you with a step-by-step guide to cooking the Western Quiche.

1. Prepare the crust: In a large mixing bowl, combine flour, butter, and a pinch of salt. Using a pastry blender or your fingers, cut the butter into the flour mixture until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs. Add ice water, one tablespoon at a time, and mix until the dough comes together. Wrap the dough in plastic and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes.

2. Preheat the oven: Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

3. Prepare the filling: In a large mixing bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper. Add the grated cheese, onions, and any additional desired ingredients.

4. Roll out the dough: Remove the dough from the refrigerator and roll it out on a lightly floured surface to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).

5. Transfer the dough to a pie dish: Place the rolled-out dough into a pie dish, pressing it into the corners and up the sides. Trim any excess dough.

6. Pour the filling: Pour the egg and cheese mixture into the pie crust.

7. Bake the quiche: Bake the quiche in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the crust is golden brown and the filling is set.

8. Serve and enjoy: Allow the quiche to cool for a few minutes, then slice and serve.

Remember, practice makes perfect, so feel free to experiment with different ingredients and techniques to create your own unique Western Quiche.

c8dbf06636.gt:
Season chicken on both sides, pushing in seasoning.
Once seasoned get a fork or knife and tenderize by poking repeatedly.
Then cover meat place in fridge about 2 hours.
After 2 hours wash your potatoes cook in microwave 1 at a time for about 4 or 5 minutes until soft.
Set aside
Chop and wash broccoli add to boiling water steam to your liking 5 or 10 minutes.
Drain water add some butter season to your taste.
Add olive oil to pan heat on medium heat.
Once heated add 2 breast at a time cooking about 5 minutes on each side.
Once almost done cover with lid cook about 5 more minutes.
(Make sure the fire is not to high the key is to cook slow)
In a pot add some butter and seasoning and peeled potatoes to pot mash up potatoes add milk , cheese, and green onions.
Blend until cheese melts.
Lumps are ok.
Time to grub place on plate lick fingers yummm!
I only used paprika on chicken..
c8dbf06636.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix the chicken pieces with a generous amount of salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs and spices.
3. In a separate bowl, mix the potatoes with a small amount of salt, pepper, and some olive oil.
4. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil.
5. Place the chicken pieces on the prepared baking sheet, spacing them out evenly.
6. Roast the chicken in the preheated oven for about 35-40 minutes, or until it reaches an internal temperature of 165°F (74°C).
7. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
8. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the potatoes by tossing them in a small amount of olive oil, salt, pepper, and your favorite herbs and spices.
9. Place the potatoes on the same baking sheet as the chicken, making sure not to overcrowd them.
10. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and golden brown.
11. Serve the chicken and potatoes together, garnished with fresh herbs or your favorite sauces.

77d4a763dd.gt:
Add 1 tbsp oil into pan and add 1/2 tsp 'WK Seed Blend'
Cut the following into 1 1/2 inch long by 1/2 inch wide strips and set aside: - tofu (1 cup) - onions (1/2 cup) - tomatoes (1/2 cup) - bell pepper (1 cup)

Grind cookies in a food processor into fine crumbs; transfer to a large mixing bowl.

Stir 1 cup confectioners' sugar, bourbon whiskey, cocoa powder, and corn syrup with the cookies and pecans until the mixture holds together; roll into 3/4-inch balls.

Roll balls in coconut and sugar to coat.
Arrange balls onto a platter, cover with plastic wrap, and refrigerate until hardened, at least 1 hour.

b379bad205.gt:
Place potato and 3 tbs water in a small bowl.
Cover with plastic wrap, vent and microwave 4 minutes or until tender, stirring once.
Set aside.
Heat a 10" skillet over med-high heat.
Coat pan with cooking spray and add onion.
Cover and cook 10 minutes or until lightly browned, stirring occasionally.
Uncover and cook 10 minutes or until golden brown, stirring frequently.
While onions cook, add 1/3 cup water, 1 Tbs at a time to prevent sticking.
Stir in potato, sage, salt and pepper.
Spoon into bowl and cool.
Combine 1/4 cup cheese, milk, egg whites and eggs in a bowl.
Add egg mixture to potato mixture and stir well.
Preheat broiler.
Pour mixture into skillet coated with cooking spray.
Cook over medium heat for 7 minutes or until bottom of frittata is browned and top is almost set.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on top and broil for 5 minutes or until cheese melts and top is set.
b379bad205.pred:
To recreate the caramelized onion frittata, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the chopped onions and cook until they are soft and caramelized.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, salt, and pepper.
4. Pour the whisked egg mixture over the caramelized onions in the skillet. Cook the frittata over medium heat until the eggs are set and the edges are slightly crispy.
5. Transfer the frittata to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the center is set and the edges are golden brown.
6. Remove from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

Enjoy your delicious caramelized onion frittata!

625c3e8493.gt:
Add coarsely chopped or halved cherries to a large pot.
Add lemon juice, cherry Kirsch, and vanilla extract and bring the mixture to a slow boil over medium-high heat.
In a bowl, whisk together cocoa powder and 2 cups of sugar until it is evenly distributed and there are no clumps.
Add the cocoa/sugar mixture to the cherries.
Add the remaining sugar.
Bring the mixture back up to a boil.
Stir in the butter and reduce the heat to medium.
Simmer for 1215 minutes, stirring often, until the sugar has completely dissolved and the mixture has thickened slightly.
The sauce will thicken further once it cools.
To can and store the Black Forest Sundae Sauce: Ladle hot sundae sauce into sterilized half pint jars, leaving 1/4 headspace.
Wipe jar rims and add lids.
Process jars in a boiling water bath for 10 minutes.
Remove the jars and cool on wire racks.
Store in a cool, dark place.
Store any opened jars in the refrigerator.
625c3e8493.pred:
To recreate the Black Forest Sundae Sauce, follow these steps:
1. Start by preparing a sundae base by layering ice cream, whipped cream, and chocolate sauce.
2. In a small saucepan, heat the chocolate sauce over medium heat.
3. Add the cherries to the saucepan, and cook until they are soft and pliable.
4. Remove the cherries from the saucepan and let them cool.
5. Once the cherries are cooled, add them to the chocolate sauce and mix well.
6. Pour the chocolate cherry mixture over the sundae base and enjoy!

Please note that these instructions are based on the image provided and may vary depending on the specific recipe or ingredients used.

3c3a00487b.gt:
combine first 5 ingredients in large bowl -- make well in center.
combine egg, milk and oil, stir well.
add to dry ingredients, just till moistened --
combine blueberries, 1 tbls flour and 1 tbls sugar, toss gently to coat.
fold into batter.
spoon batter into 6 greased jumbo muffin cups, 2/3 rds full --
combine 1/4 cup sugar, 2 1/2 tbls flour and cinnamon, cut in butter -- till crumbly --
sprinkle over batter.
bake at 400* for 20 minutes or golden.
remove from pan to wire rack immediately.
3c3a00487b.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and melted butter.
4. Pour the wet ingredients into the dry ingredients and mix until just combined.
5. Fold in the blueberries and the streusel topping.
6. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Blueberry Streusel Muffins!

e77203d622.gt:
Throw the ingredients in a blender and whizz until smooth.
Easy!
Great for a fast breakfast and packed full of fruit for a healthy start or snack
Using frozen fruit means there's no need to chill.
If you have leftovers, stir in some lemon juice to keep the colour nice.
It gives an added yogurty tang too
Makes 500mls/2 cups.
I classed it as 4 kid sized portions as I make it for Jack

c3b113f071.gt:
Cook bacon and set aside.
Fry beef with mushrooms and salt and pepper (or seasoning of your choice).
Unroll crescent triangles on baking sheet.
Add a thick slice of cheese, bacon, beef mixture and green onions to each triangle and roll up.
Place a thin piece of cheese on top of roll.

337c3e4209.gt:
Heat oven to 350 degrees.
Wash potatoes and leave the skins on.
Cut into large, equal-sized chunks, and place them in a large mixing bowl.
Slice the onion thickly, separate and place them in the bowl as well.
Add all of your dry ingredients, along with the olive oil, and give it a good mix to evenly distribute everything together.
Cut each sausage link into thirds and place in the bowl with the potatoes and onions.
From here, I mix this all together with my hands.
Gently mix the sausage into the potato and onion mixture, trying not to break apart the sausage as you do this.
Dump this all into a 13 x 9 baking dish and cover with aluminum foil.
Place in the oven and allow this to cook for a minimum of one hour.
After an hour, turn the oven up to 400 degrees, remove the foil and place back in the oven until the sausage is nicely brown.
Stir every few minutes so all the sausage gets some equal browning space.
This can take anywhere from 15 to 30 minutes to achieve.
Make sure you watch this closely after returning to the oven so your potatoes and sausage dont burn.
Notes: I used light tasting olive oil, which is my preference.
If you prefer a stronger tasting oil, like extra virgin olive oil, feel free to use it.
While I normally cook with fresh, chopped garlic, I dont use it in this recipe, and substitute the garlic powder.
Fresh garlic tends to pool in the bottom of the dish, or on the top, and burns when browning the sausage.
337c3e4209.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into even-sized pieces.
3. Wash and pat dry the sausages.
4. In a large mixing bowl, combine the potatoes, sausages, and a drizzle of olive oil. Season with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
5. Spread the potato and sausage mixture evenly on a baking sheet or roasting pan.
6. Roast the potatoes and sausages in the preheated oven for 30-40 minutes, or until the potatoes are tender and the sausages are cooked through.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious sausage and potatoes dish!

11e9299476.gt:
Preheat the oven according the directions for the biscuits.
Have the biscuits ready to put in oven
Start cooking the Sausage.
Once cook drain out the oil that's in the pan
Leave sausage in pan.
Add the flour and the milk.
Put heat to high and continue to mix.
Don't stop mixing until the gravy starts to boil.
Once its boiling, lower down heat to simmer for 5min.
Don't touch for those 5min.
Now put in the biscuits in the oven
Once the 5min is up give the gravy a little mix and set aside to cool down.
The longer it sits outside the thicker it would get.
When the biscuits are ready open them up and pour the sausage gravy on top.
Enjoy.

ea0c63b401.gt:

c3ac924e63.gt:
Light a grill.
Shape the meat into 4 patties and season on both sides with salt and pepper.
Wrap each hamburger with 2 slices of pancetta.

Flip the burgers and top them with the Gorgonzola.

Set the burgers on the bun bottoms and top with the lettuce, tomato and onion.
Serve at once.

ffcb21a60b.gt:
In a pot combine vegetable broth and milk and bring to a boil.
turn off heat, stir in polenta and cook until thickened (abut 3-5 minutes).
Set aside to thicken further.
Clean, wash and peel the carrots.
Slice lenghtwise.
Heat butter in a skillet and add carrots.
Saute for some minutes, then add 5 tbs of water and cook covered on medium heat for another ten minutes until soft.
Season with sugar, salt and pepper.
Add sour cream or yoghurt, sage and half of the cheese to the polenta and stir to combine.
Season with salt and pepper to taste.
Pour into a casserole dish (about 20X12 cm) and top with the carrots (I used their liquid too since it was full of flavour, but that way the casserole may get a bit soggy).
Sprinkle with remaining cheese and bake in the preheated oven at 200C (~400F) for 20 minutes.
Let stand for about 5 minutes until polenta has set and can be sliced.
ffcb21a60b.pred:

3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and a pinch of salt and pepper.

This Baked Polenta Carrot Casserole is a delicious and comforting dish that combines the flavors of carrots, polenta, and eggs. It is a great option for a warm and satisfying meal.

FRIED SCRUMBLE EGGS
fried scrumble egg set aside
BAKE BACON
bake bacon on parchment paper at 200 C for 15 minute then set aside

6bf369490a.gt:
Stir boiling water into dry gelatin mix in large bowl at least 2 min.
until completely dissolved.
Drain pineapple, reserving juice.
Add enough ice to juice to measure 1-1/2 cups.

Cut into 9 squares.

4a46bab1e9.gt:
Mix all ingredients together, I use my stand mixer with the dough hook.
Let mixer kneed the dough for about 5 minutes.
Dough should be moist and pliable but not sticky, if it is dry add more water, if it is too sticky add a little extra flour.
Coat a bowl with a little oil place dough in the bowl and cover with cling wrap and leave for about 1 hour or till doubled in size.
Once doubled in size dust bench lightly with flour turn out dough and lightly press down to remove a little of the air.
Form into your choice of loaf, I like to use a proofing basket, but you could use a tin or free form.
Let the loaf rise for another 40 min to 1 hour.
Pre heat your oven to super hot 450 F/ 250C.
I use a pizza stone but it can go straight in the oven on a tray if you don't have one.
Leave oven temp on high for 10 min then reduce to 375 F/ 190 C for a further 20 minute.
Enjoy!

- Wash and dry the romaine lettuce thoroughly.
- Cut the romaine lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
- In a large bowl, whisk together the Caesar dressing ingredients: 2 tablespoons of olive oil, 1/4 cup of grated Parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup of lemon juice, 1/4 cup of grated garlic, 1/4 cup of grated onion, 1/4 cup of grated anchovy paste, 1/4 cup of grated mustard, 1/4 cup of grated Worcestershire sauce, 1/4 cup of grated capers, 1/4 cup of grated black pepper, and 1/4 cup of grated nutmeg.
- Add the romaine lettuce to the bowl and toss to coat the lettuce evenly with the dressing.
- Refrigerate the Caesar salad for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.

2. Grilling:
- Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.
- Lightly oil the grill grates and place the Caesar salad on the grill.
- Cook the salad for about 5-7 minutes, or until the lettuce is slightly wilted and the dressing is slightly caramelized.
- Remove the salad from the grill and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

3. Serving:
- Serve the grilled Caesar salad immediately, allowing the flavors to meld together and the salad to cool slightly.
- Enjoy your delicious grilled Caesar salad!

[/INST]

35f4aac182.gt:
Place rice into the bento, cover the whole surface with bonito flakes, and drizzle with a round of soy sauce.
Top it with shredded nori seaweed and roasted sesame.
The crackly texture and aroma of the baked seaweed is delicious.
Cover with lots of kettle-cooked shirasu.
Shred shiso leaves and scatter.
It smells great.
Top it with ginger to taste .
Grate a daikon radish, lightly squeezing out the excess water, mix with ponzu sauce in a small container to make grated ponzu sauce.
It tastes great to eat this with the grated ponzu sauce from Step 5.
In addition to the bento: Misakiko fried tuna katsu, Kanagawa komatsuna and daikon radish, aburaage stir-fry, Odawara fish paste with shiso leaves and pickled plums, imitation crab meat fried eggs, and tomatoes and shiso leaves.
Try eating the fried tuna katsu with lots of grated daikon and ponzu sauce from Step 5 ..
35f4aac182.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: rice, shirasu (small fish), vegetables, and a bento box.
2. Cook the rice according to the package instructions, ensuring it is cooked to the desired level of doneness.
3. Rinse the shirasu and pat them dry.
4. Cut the vegetables into bite-sized pieces, including a variety of colors and textures.
5. In a small bowl, mix the shirasu with a pinch of salt and a splash of water. Allow the shirasu to marinate for a few minutes.
6. In a separate bowl, mix the vegetables with a light dressing of soy sauce, olive oil, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
7. Place the cooked rice in the bento box, and arrange the marinated shirasu on top.
8. Add the vegetables on top of the shirasu, ensuring they are evenly distributed.
9. Serve the meal immediately, and enjoy the delicious Kettle-cooked Shirasu Rice Bowl Bento.

[/SYS]

6f3b4ebeac.gt:
Cut the apple/pear and ginger into fine pieces.
Thinly slice the chili.
Mix chili, ginger, syrup, cinnamon, orange juice and zest in a saucepan and heat until it is boiling.
Add the apples/pears and bring to a boil again.
Add walnuts and raisins, and boil for about 5 minutes.
Pour into a glass with a tight fitting lid and cool completely.
(It will thicken up a bit when cooled down.)
Store in the fridge for a few weeks.
Serve with home baked baguettes, artisan bread and lots of wonderful cheeses.
Yum!
Enjoy!
6f3b4ebeac.pred:
[/SYS]

To recreate the apple chutney with ginger, walnuts, and raisins, follow these steps:
1. Wash and peel the apples, and chop them into small pieces.
2. In a large saucepan, heat some oil over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped apples and cook them until they are soft and tender.
4. Add the grated ginger and cook for a few more minutes.
5. Add the chopped walnuts and raisins, and cook for a few more minutes.
6. Add the required amount of sugar and stir well.
7. Cook the mixture for a few more minutes, stirring occasionally, until the sugar has dissolved and the chutney is smooth and well-cooked.
8. Remove the saucepan from the heat and let the chutney cool for a few minutes.
9. Serve the apple chutney with ginger, walnuts, and raisins as a delicious and healthy snack or condiment.

[/SYS]

4816a33066.gt:
Heat oil in large skillet over medium-high heat until shimmering.
Add onion and salt and stir until coated with oil.
Reduce heat to medium, cover, and cook, stirring occasionally, until onion is soft, about 10 minutes (if onion begins to burn after 5 minutes, reduce heat to low).
Add garlic and chili powder and cook, uncovered, stirring constantly, until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add beef and cook, breaking up meat with wooden spoon, until just pink, about 3 minutes.
Add 1/4 teaspoon pepper, brown sugar, tomato puree, ketchup, water, and hot sauce.
Simmer until Sloppy Joe sauce is slightly thicker than ketchup, 8 to 10 minutes.
Adjust seasonings.
Spoon meat mixture onto hamburger buns and serve.
Make Ahead: If you find yourself with leftover Sloppy Joes or just feel like making a double batch, the meat mixture freezes well for up to one month.
To return the meat mixture to its original consistency, you may need to add a little water when it is reheated.
4816a33066.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, follow these instructions:
1. In a large skillet, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat.
2. Add the onions and cook until they are softened and translucent, about 5 minutes.
3. Add the ground beef and cook until it is browned, breaking it up into small pieces as it cooks.
4. Add the tomatoes, beef broth, ketchup, brown sugar, and Worcestershire sauce. Stir to combine.
5. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 15-20 minutes, or until the meat is tender and the sauce has thickened.
6. Serve the Sloppy Joes over a bed of cooked noodles or rice.

Enjoy your delicious Sloppy Joes!

27b86a0c47.gt:
Combine Parmesan cheese, lemon juice, anchovy paste, pepper, Worcestershire sauce, egg yolk, and minced garlic in a mini food processor; process 15 seconds.
With the processor on, gradually add olive oil, processing until combined.
Toss with romaine lettuce.
27b86a0c47.pred:
To prepare the Caesar Vinaigrette meal, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the Caesar Vinaigrette dressing by combining the ingredients listed in the image, such as mayonnaise, lemon juice, garlic, and anchovies.
2. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions, using a suitable pasta shape like fettuccine or linguine.
3. Once the pasta is cooked, drain it and toss it with the Caesar Vinaigrette dressing.
4. Add the grated Parmesan cheese and toss the pasta again to ensure the cheese is evenly distributed.
5. Serve the Caesar Vinaigrette pasta immediately, and enjoy the delicious meal.

[/INST]

842d3c7eb8.gt:
Combine and mix all of the ingredients together in a bowl.
Mix the egg whites in a cutting motion.
Strain the mixture through a sieve and cook the tamagoyaki in a tamagoyaki pan.
Once cooled, cut into long strips.
842d3c7eb8.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- Tamagoyaki Omelette: eggs, tamagoyaki pan, and a non-stick pan or skillet.
- Sushi Hand Rolls: sushi rice, sushi nori, sushi rolls, and a sushi rolling mat.
- Other ingredients: wasabi, soy sauce, and a cutting board.

2. Prepare the Tamagoyaki Omelette:
- Crack the eggs into a bowl and whisk them together.
- Heat the tamagoyaki pan over medium heat.
- Pour the whisked eggs onto the pan, spreading them evenly.
- Cook the omelette until the edges start to curl and the center is set.
- Use a spatula to flip the omelette and cook the other side.
- Once cooked, remove the omelette from the pan and let it cool for a few minutes.

3. Prepare the Sushi Hand Rolls:
- Rinse the sushi rice in a strainer.
- Place the rice in a bowl and mix it with the sushi nori, wasabi, and soy sauce.
- Spread the rice mixture evenly on the sushi rolling mat.
- Place the sushi rolls on top of the rice mixture, seam-side down.
- Roll the sushi rolls using the sushi rolling mat, starting from the bottom and working your way up.
- Cut the sushi rolls into bite-sized pieces.

4. Prepare the cutting board and other ingredients:
- Clean and chop the ingredients as needed.
- Set up the cutting board and other necessary utensils.

5. Assemble the meal:
- Place the cooked tamagoyaki omelette on a plate.
- Serve the sushi hand rolls on the side, alongside wasabi and soy sauce for dipping.

Enjoy your delicious and appetizing meal!

131faa12b8.gt:
Stir together 1 cup yogurt, 2 tablespoons oil, 1 tablespoon lemon juice, salt and spices.
Add chicken and turn until well coated.
Marinate at room temperature for 20 minutes.
While the chicken is marinating, preheat grill.
While grill is heating, stir together remaining 1 1/4 cups yogurt and 1 1/2 tablespoons lemon juice and salt to taste.
Reduce grill to moderate heat.
Grill chicken (discard marinade), on lightly oiled grill rack, turning occasionally (closing grill between turns), until cooked through, 10 to 12 minutes total.
Transfer chicken to a platter.
Toss together mint, shallot and remaining oil in a small bowl.
Drizzle chicken with yogurt sauce and top with mint salad.
131faa12b8.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: chicken breasts, yogurt, spices, and any other desired seasonings.
2. Preheat your grill or oven to a medium-high heat.
3. Season the chicken breasts with the spices of your choice, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Place the chicken breasts on a baking sheet or a grill pan, and cook them on the preheated grill or oven for approximately 10-15 minutes, or until they are fully cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).
5. While the chicken is cooking, prepare the spiced yogurt. In a small bowl, mix together the yogurt and desired spices.
6. Once the chicken is fully cooked, remove it from the grill or oven and let it rest for a few minutes.
7. While the chicken is resting, use a spoon to scoop some of the spiced yogurt onto the chicken breasts.
8. Serve the grilled chicken breasts with the spiced yogurt on the side, allowing the diners to enjoy the flavors of both the chicken and the yogurt.

By following these steps, you will be able to cook a delicious and satisfying Grilled Chicken Breasts in Spiced Yogurt dish.

fd5fe058a6.gt:
Heat oil in skillet.
Add garlic and shallots saute until tender.
Add wine and oregano.
Simmer 4 minutes.
Add clams and heat just until they open.
Discard any that do not open.
fd5fe058a6.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the minced garlic and cook for a few seconds until fragrant.
3. Add the clams to the skillet, and cook until they open, which usually takes about 3-5 minutes.
4. Pour the white wine into the skillet, and stir to combine with the clams.
5. Add the chopped onion, and cook until it is softened.
6. Add the minced shallot, and cook for another minute.
7. Add the heavy cream, and stir to combine.
8. Bring the sauce to a simmer, and cook for about 5 minutes, or until it thickens slightly.
9. Season the sauce with salt and pepper to taste.
10. Transfer the cooked clams and sauce to a large baking dish.
11. Bake the dish in the preheated oven for about 10-15 minutes, or until the clams are cooked through and the sauce is bubbly and slightly caramelized.
12. Serve the Clams in White Wine Sauce immediately, and enjoy!

[/SYS]

0b797c29a0.gt:
Reserve 1 tablespoon of olive oil,now heat the remainder in a medium saucepan
Add the garlic and a pinch.of salt and over low heat.stirring until golden brown.then remove the pan from the heat.do not let the garlic burn as it will taint its flavor.if its burn you will have to start over.
Meanwhile, bring a large saucepan of lightly salted water to a boil.add the spaghetti and remaining olive oil and cook for 10 to 12 minutes, until tender.
Drain the spaghetti thoroughly and return to the pan.
Add the oil and garlic mixture to the spaghetti and toss to coat.season with pepper,add the chopped fresh parsley, and toss to coat.
Put on a plater and serve warm, serve immediately.
0b797c29a0.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: Spaghetti, olive oil, garlic, salt, pepper, and any additional desired ingredients.
2. Cook the spaghetti according to the package instructions.
3. While the spaghetti is cooking, heat the olive oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium heat.
4. Add minced garlic to the skillet and cook for about 1 minute, stirring constantly, until fragrant.
5. Add the cooked spaghetti to the skillet and toss to combine with the garlic and oil.
6. Season the spaghetti with salt and pepper to taste.
7. Serve the spaghetti immediately, garnished with additional ingredients if desired.

Please note that these steps are general guidelines and may vary depending on the specific recipe and individual preferences.

56045e7740.gt:
Heat gas grill on medium or charcoal grill until coals are ash white.
Thread meat, pineapple, red bell pepper and onion alternately onto skewers.
Combine butter, hoisin sauce and orange zest in bowl; stir until well mixed.
Spread about 1/3 mixture onto 1 side of each skewer.
Place skewers onto grill, glaze-side up.
Grill 2-4 minutes or until browned.
Turn skewers; brush grilled side with about 1/3 glaze.
Continue grilling, turning often and brushing with glaze, 8-12 minutes or until meat reaches desired doneness.
56045e7740.pred:
1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 8-10 beef skewers (preferably flank steak)
- 1/4 cup soy sauce
- 2 tablespoons honey
- 1/4 cup orange juice
- 1/4 cup teriyaki sauce
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1/4 cup grated fresh ginger
- 1/4 cup minced garlic
- 1/4 cup chopped scallions
- 1/4 cup chopped cilantro
- 1/4 cup sesame seeds
- 1/4 cup toasted sesame oil
- 1/4 cup water
- 1/4 cup cornstarch
- 1/4 cup cold water
- Salt and pepper to taste

2. Prepare the marinade:
- In a small bowl, mix the soy sauce, honey, orange juice, teriyaki sauce, olive oil, grated ginger, minced garlic, and chopped scallions.
- Cover the beef skewers with the marinade and refrigerate for at least 2 hours or overnight.

3. Preheat the grill:
- Preheat your grill to medium-high heat.

4. Grill the beef skewers:
- Remove the beef skewers from the marinade and shake off any excess.
- Grill the beef skewers for 4-5 minutes per side, or until they are cooked to your desired level of doneness.

5. Prepare the sauce:
- In a small bowl, mix the cornstarch and cold water.
- Stir the mixture until it reaches a smooth consistency.
- Add the sauce mixture to the grilled beef skewers and toss to coat evenly.

6. Serve:
- Serve the grilled orange teriyaki beef skewers over a bed of rice or noodles.

Enjoy your delicious grilled orange teriyaki beef skewers!

fda9c36818.gt:
Put all of the ingredients in a jar for the dressing and shake to mix throughly.
That's all.
It keeps up to 1 week.
Thinly cut daikon radish into match sticks.
Add sliced onions.
Wakame seaweed.
Pour the dressing over the salad.
Daikon radish & carrot with crispy boiled and chirimen jako salad.The combination is great.
I found this salad dressing container at a 100 yen shop.
Perfect for storing liquids!
Cheap and convenient!
Just put all the ingredients to shake it up.
fda9c36818.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients for the dish, including sesame seeds, soy sauce, and any other seasonings or flavorings you prefer.
2. In a small bowl, mix the sesame seeds and soy sauce together until the sesame seeds are evenly coated with the sauce.
3. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
4. Spread the sesame seeds evenly on a baking sheet and roast them in the preheated oven for about 5-7 minutes, or until they are golden brown and fragrant.
5. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the sesame seeds cool for a few minutes.
6. In a small bowl, mix the sesame seeds with the soy sauce mixture until the dressing is well combined.
7. Serve the Japanese-style Sesame Dressing on top of your favorite dish, such as rice, noodles, or a salad.

Enjoy your delicious Japanese-style Sesame Dressing!

1d309c893f.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
In a large mixing bowl, combine the chicken, soup, cheese, milk, salt, pepper and butter.
Mix together and pour mixture into a 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake at 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 5 to 10 minutes or until cheese is melted and bubbly, and casserole is hot in the center.

1e5cac3aa5.gt:
Arrange tomato slices on a serving platter.
Lay 1 avocado slice on top of each tomato, and top with fresh mozzarella.
Drizzle olive oil, then balsamic vinegar over the tops, and season with salt and pepper.
1e5cac3aa5.pred:
1. Wash and chop the ingredients:
- Lettuce
- Cherry tomatoes
- Cucumber
- Bell peppers
- Olives
- Fresh basil
- Parmesan cheese

2. Combine the ingredients in a large bowl:
- Add the chopped lettuce, cherry tomatoes, cucumber, bell peppers, and olives to the bowl.
- Toss the ingredients together to combine.

3. Add the fresh basil and Parmesan cheese:
- Add the fresh basil leaves to the bowl and toss them in gently.
- Sprinkle the grated Parmesan cheese over the top of the ingredients.

4. Serve:
- Serve the Insalata Tricolore on a plate, garnished with additional fresh basil leaves if desired.

5. Enjoy:
- Enjoy the delicious and healthy Insalata Tricolore salad.

3e392f1d33.gt:
Melt chocolate in oil (microwave), and add the rest in the order shown making sure that the eggs don't cook in the warmed oil/chocolate.
Before adding the flour, mix the salt and baking powder into the flour - then mix the flour mixture into the batter.
Pour the completed mixture into a greased and floured 9 inch x 13 inch cake pan.
Sprinkle some chopped nuts on top if desired.
Bake at 350F (180C) for 30 minutes.
Let cool at least 15 minutes.

1. Ingredients:

0e781ad046.gt:
Roast a whole butternut pumpkin.
When soft, scoop out the flesh and mash or process before adding a teaspoon of ground cumin, crunchy peanut butter and a splash of chilli sauce to taste.
Add a drizzle of olive oil, and stir well.
Serve in a bowl with crackers or pita bread.
0e781ad046.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Cut the pumpkin into small pieces and place them in a large mixing bowl.
3. Add the following ingredients: 1/2 cup of olive oil, 1/2 cup of plain yogurt, 1/2 cup of grated Parmesan cheese, 1/4 cup of honey, 1/4 cup of lemon juice, 1/4 cup of chopped fresh parsley, 1/4 cup of chopped fresh cilantro, 1/4 cup of chopped fresh basil, 1/4 cup of chopped fresh oregano, 1/4 cup of chopped fresh thyme, 1/4 cup of chopped fresh rosemary, and salt and pepper to taste.
4. Mix all the ingredients together until well combined.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for about 25-30 minutes, or until the dip is bubbly and golden brown.
6. Serve the roast pumpkin dip warm, with pita chips or crackers, for a delicious and healthy snack or appetizer.

[/SYS]

6970e8f99b.gt:
Preheat oven to 300F and grease an 8x8 baking pan.
Combine unsweetened chocolate and butter in a medium saucepan and melt over medium low heat, stirring constantly until pieces are almost melted.
Remove from the heat and stir until smooth.
In a large bowl using an electric mixer on medium speed, beat eggs until light yellow in color--about 5 minutes.
Add sugar and blend on low until thoroughly combined.
Add vanilla and melted chocolate to the egg sugar mixture.
Blend on low until smooth.
Add the flour and mix thoroughly.
Pour batter into greased pan.
Smooth surface with a spatula, and sprinkle uniformly with chocolate chips.
Bake on center rack of oven for 45-55 minutes.
The batter should be set and a toothpick inserted into the center should come out clean.
Do not overbake.
Cool to room temperature.
Cover and refrigerate for at least one hour.
Cut and serve chilled.
6970e8f99b.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, and vanilla extract until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
6. Pour the batter into a greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
7. Bake for 25-30 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the brownies comes out clean.
8. Allow the brownies to cool in the pan for about 10 minutes, then transfer them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade Mrs. Fields Super Fudge Brownies!

65e738299c.gt:
Heat the olive oil over medium heat in a large, heavy pot.
Saute the onion for a couple of minutes until softened but not browned.
Add the rice and saute for a minute or two until it turns slightly translucent.
Add the wine and stir until absorbed.
Next, add the broth one ladle at a time, stirring very frequently.
When the rice begins to dry out, add another ladle.
After about 15 minutes, begin to check the grains.
When the rice begins to break down but is still slightly tough inside, add the vegetables, basil, salt and pepper.
Add the last few ladles of veggie broth and work in the vegetables.
If youve run out of broth, use water and add salt, if needed.
Within 5 to 10 minutes, the rice will become tender and creamy.
Once the mix is thick and starchy, take it off of the heat and stir in the cheese.
Garnish with a bit more basil and more cheese, if desired.
65e738299c.pred:
1. First, gather all the necessary ingredients for the dish, including rice, vegetables, and any other required components.
2. In a large pot, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the rice and cook until it becomes translucent.
3. Add the vegetables, such as bell peppers, onions, and mushrooms, and cook until they are tender.
4. Gradually pour in the broth, stirring constantly to ensure the rice is evenly coated.
5. Continue cooking the risotto until the rice is cooked through and the liquid has been absorbed.
6. Season the dish with salt, pepper, and any other desired herbs or spices.
7. Serve the Summer Risotto hot, garnished with fresh herbs or a drizzle of extra virgin olive oil.

[/SYS]

496db791a3.gt:
In a bowl, stir together the strawberries, sugar, orange juice, and Grand Marnier.
Set aside for 30 minutes to macerate.
Position a rack in the upper third of the oven and preheat the oven to 375 degrees F. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper.
In a large bowl, sift together the flour, cocoa, and baking powder.
Whisk in the sugar and salt.
In another bowl, whisk together the egg, cream, butter, and vanilla.
Stir the cream mixture into the flour mixture.
Using a tablespoon, drop 6 to 8 shortcakes onto the prepared baking sheet, spacing the mounds evenly (the shortcakes will expand slightly as they bake).
Bake the shortcakes until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean, about 15 to 18 minutes.
Transfer to a rack and let cool.
To whip the cream: In the bowl of a mixer fitted with the whip attachment, on medium-high speed, beat the cream, sugar, and vanilla to medium-stiff peaks.
Do not overbeat.
To serve, split the shortcakes horizontally.
Top the bottom half with a big spoonful of strawberries (including some of the juices) and a big dollop of whipped cream.
Top with the top layer of shortcake, and spoon some berries over the top.
Top with more whipped cream, drizzle with some of the juices, and serve.
496db791a3.pred:
1. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, sugar, baking powder, and salt.
3. Cut in the butter until the mixture resembles coarse crumbs.
4. Add the egg and milk, stirring until the dough comes together.
5. Turn the dough out onto a floured surface and knead a few times.
6. Roll the dough out to a thickness of about 1/2 inch (1.25 cm).
7. Cut the dough into circles using a cookie cutter or the rim of a glass.
8. Place the dough circles on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
9. Bake for 12-15 minutes or until the edges are golden brown.
10. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

1. In a large mixing bowl, combine the strawberries, sugar, and cornstarch.
2. Gently toss the mixture to coat the strawberries evenly.
3. Cover the bowl and refrigerate for at least 1 hour or until the strawberries are well-chilled.
4. Preheat oven to 350°F (175°C).
5. In a small mixing bowl, whisk the egg whites until they form soft peaks.
6. In a separate small mixing bowl, combine the sugar and cornstarch.
7. Gradually add the hot water to the sugar mixture, whisking constantly to prevent lumps.
8. Add the whipped egg whites to the sugar mixture, whisking until well combined.
9. Pour the mixture over the chilled strawberries in the large mixing bowl.
10. Gently fold the mixture together until well combined.
11. Pour the mixture into a greased and floured 9-inch (23 cm) round cake pan.
12. Bake for 30-35 minutes or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.
13. Allow the cake to cool

56c2b059eb.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F.
In four small cast iron skillets or one medium skillet, crumble half the cookie dough into small pieces, spreading in an even layer over bottom of skillet(s).
Drizzle hot fudge sauce over cookie dough.
Crumble remaining cookie dough on top of hot fudge, making sure to spread in an even layer.
Bake for 1820 minutes, or until top is golden brown and set.
Remove skillet(s) from oven and allow to cool slightly.
Serve with vanilla ice cream and extra hot fudge sauce, if desired.
Enjoy!
56c2b059eb.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter, sugar, and vanilla extract until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the flour, cocoa powder, baking powder, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, mixing until just combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased 9x9 inch baking dish.
6. Bake for 25-30 minutes or until a toothpick inserted into the center of the cookie comes out clean.
7. Allow the cookie to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring it to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Chocolate Fudge Skillet Cookie!

e6bf3951b6.gt:
Cook meat and onion and green pepper until meat is browned and vegetables under tender.
Drain.
Stir in remaining ingredients and cover and simmer for 1 hour.
Remove Bay leaf when finished.

e2b5a77d87.gt:
Heat oil in pan on low to medium heat, then throw in onion and sugar.
Cook for a couple of minutes, stirring from time to time.
Throw in mustard, stir to combine, and cook until onion is done to your liking, stirring as necessary.
Combine eggs, salt, pepper and cream cheese - don't worry if the cheese doesn't incorporate, it will once it's heated - and throw into pan, stirring everything together.
If mixture is too thick, add a little milk.
Add tomatoes, stirring and cooking until eggs are almost done, then add grated cheese and stir to melt and heat through.
Add extra salt & pepper if desired.
e2b5a77d87.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Gather the necessary ingredients: eggs, tomatoes, onions, and any other desired seasonings or herbs.
2. Heat a non-stick pan or skillet over medium heat.
3. Add the chopped onions to the pan and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the chopped tomatoes to the pan and cook until they are soft and slightly mushy.
5. Crack the eggs into the pan and stir gently to combine the ingredients.
6. Cook the eggs until they are scrambled and cooked through.
7. Season the scrambled eggs with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
8. Serve the scrambled eggs on a plate and enjoy your delicious meal.

Remember to use proper cooking techniques and utensils to ensure the safety and quality of the meal.

27e3ef474d.gt:
This recipes makes about 1 quart of frozen yogurt.
Place the blackberries in the bowl of a food processor.
Process until smooth.
Strain the blackberries through a fine mesh sieve set over a large mixing bowl.
Using the back of a spoon, press the mixture against the sieve to extract all the juice.
Discard the seeds and any pulp.
Add the yogurt to the blackberry juice and stir to combine.
Add about 3/4 cup of honey and taste for sweetness.
You may need more honey depending on how sweet the blackberries are.
I used just under 1 cup.
Add vanilla if desired and blend until smooth.
Process in an ice cream maker according to manufacturers instructions.
Serve immediately if you prefer a soft serve consistency or put it into a freezer safe container and freeze until firm.
If frozen remove from the freezer about 15 minutes before serving.
Recipe adapted from Southern Living Magazine.
27e3ef474d.pred:
To recreate the blackberry frozen yogurt, follow these steps:
1. Prepare the blackberries: Wash the blackberries thoroughly and remove any stems or leaves.
2. Prepare the frozen yogurt: Choose a high-quality frozen yogurt that you enjoy.
3. Assemble the ingredients: In a blender or food processor, combine the blackberries, frozen yogurt, and a small amount of honey or sugar to taste.
4. Blend the ingredients: Blend the blackberries and frozen yogurt until smooth and creamy.
5. Freeze the mixture: Pour the blended mixture into a frozen yogurt maker or a plastic container, and freeze it for at least 4 hours or overnight.
6. Serve: Once the frozen yogurt is completely frozen, scoop it into bowls and enjoy your homemade blackberry frozen yogurt.

Please note that these instructions are based on the image provided and may vary depending on the specific recipe or ingredients used.

ec1a27fd77.gt:
In a ceramic bowl over boiling water melt the chocolate, water and butter together over a pot of boiling water.
(Bain marie method)
Pour the melted chocolate over the sugar and mix well.
Then separate the egg yolks from the egg whites.
And one by one add the yolks to the mixture mixing after each one.
Beat the egg whites until they are firm.
Then fold the egg whites into the chocolate mixture.
Once its all nicely mixed spoon into invidual ramekins.
Leave in the fridge for two hours to set.
Once set decorate your mousse.
I sprinkled powdered suger over mine just before serving and added a few slices of banana.
ec1a27fd77.pred:
[/SYS]

1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup of unsweetened cocoa powder, 1 cup of granulated sugar, and 1/2 cup of unsalted butter.
3. Add 2 cups of milk and whisk until smooth.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk 4 large eggs and 1/2 cup of granulated sugar until the mixture is smooth and fluffy.

f31dd42e03.gt:
Turn crock pot on high while preparing ingredients.
In crock pot, mix together both packages of bearnaise sauce mix, wine, tarragon, turmeric and garlic powder until well blended.
Add shallots, ham, red pepper, potatoes artichokes and chicken.
Stir gently.
Cover, reduce heat setting to low and cook 6 hours.

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the chicken with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
3. Heat some oil in a large skillet over medium-high heat. Once hot, add the chicken and cook until browned on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
4. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add some more oil and cook the onions until they are soft and translucent.
6. Add the garlic and cook for another minute.
7. Pour in the chicken broth and bring the mixture to a simmer.
8. Add the chicken back to the skillet, cover, and cook in the oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until the chicken is fully cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
9. Remove the chicken from the skillet and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into pieces.
10. Serve the chicken with the sauce over rice or your preferred side dish.

[/SYS]

8fe5441410.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees.
Bake the yams until they are not quite done.
Remove them from the oven and allow them to cool.
Cut off the ends, peel them and cut them into approximately 1 slices.
Heat a heavy 10 skillet or pot on medium-low and melt the Earth Balance.
Add the honey, maple syrup, and barley malt syrup and stir.
Add the sliced yams to the pan, wedging them all in there.
Lift the pan (wearing pot holders), tilting it so that the sauce covers the yams.
Cook for 10 minutes, lifting and tilting occasionally.
Carefully turn the yams over.
Cook for another 10 minutes, lifting and tilting your pan again so the sauce covers the yams.
8fe5441410.pred:
1. Wash the candied yams thoroughly under cold running water to remove any dirt or debris.
2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. Line a baking sheet with parchment paper or aluminum foil to make it easy to handle and clean.
4. Peel the candied yams and cut them into evenly sized pieces.
5. Place the candied yams on the prepared baking sheet.
6. Drizzle the candied yams with melted butter, and season with salt, pepper, and any additional desired flavors.
7. Roast the candied yams in the preheated oven for about 30-40 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly caramelized.
8. Remove the candied yams from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes before serving.

By following these instructions, you will be able to prepare a delicious and appetizing meal using candied yams.

3d9830c9de.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F.
Combine all the ingredients except for the artichoke bottoms and the beef broth.
Divide and mound the meat mixture on the artichoke bottoms, about 4 tablespoons each.
In a well greased baking pan, place the filled artichokes, filled side up, in one layer.
Pour the broth over the whole thing.
Bake, lightly covered with foil, for 1 1/2 hours.
Uncover and bake another 10-15 minutes, until browned.
Serve hot.
3d9830c9de.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Clean the artichokes by removing the tough outer leaves and trimming the stem.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the minced garlic, breadcrumbs, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper.
4. Add the artichoke hearts to the bowl and toss them in the breadcrumb mixture until they are evenly coated.
5. Place the stuffed artichokes on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
6. Bake the stuffed artichokes in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
7. Remove the baking sheet from the oven and let the stuffed artichokes cool for a few minutes before serving.

[/SYS]

8b0f1ee273.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large saucepan combine broth, undrained tomatoes and orzo.
Bring to boiling.
Stir in Grilled & Ready Southwestern Chicken Strips.
Transfer mixture to a 2-quart baking dish.
Bake, covered, for 25 to 30 minutes or until pasta is tender.
Uncover and sprinkle with cheese during last 5 minutes of baking.
Let stand, covered, for 10 minutes before serving.
8b0f1ee273.pred:
To prepare the meal, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cooked chicken, orzo pasta, and any desired seasonings such as salt, pepper, and Italian herbs.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk together the egg and milk.
4. Pour the egg and milk mixture over the chicken and orzo mixture, and stir to combine.
5. Pour the mixture into a greased baking dish or casserole dish.
6. Bake the casserole in the preheated oven for about 25-30 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the pasta is tender.
7. Serve the Zesty Chicken Orzo Casserole hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

This meal is a delicious and comforting dish that combines the flavors of chicken, orzo pasta, and a zesty seasoning. The casserole is easy to prepare and can be enjoyed by the whole family.

96679eee56.gt:
Blend four, 1 cup sugar, 3 tbsp melted butter, and milk until smooth.
Pour into greased 1 1/2 quart baking dish.
Pour fruit on top of batter.
Sprinkle remaining sugar on top.
Dot with remaining butter.
Bake on 375 for 45 min or until golden brown on top.
NOTE: If using fresh fruit, boil fruit with 1/4 cup water and 1 tbsp sugar until water is reduced to a syrup.

To make Old Fashioned Southern Peach Cobbler, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine 1 cup of sugar, 1/2 cup of flour, 1/2 cup of all-purpose or self-rising flour, 1/2 cup of milk, and 1/2 cup of melted butter.
3. Add 4 cups of fresh peaches, sliced, and mix until well combined.
4. Pour the mixture into a 9x9 inch baking dish, and smooth the top with a spatula.
5. Bake the cobbler in the preheated oven for 35-40 minutes, or until the top is golden brown and the filling is bubbly.
6. Allow the cobbler to cool for a few minutes before serving.

46dc2bc350.gt:
Break noodles
Mix everything together.
Mix flavor packets with 1 cup oil, 1/2 cup sugar, 1/2 cup white vinegar,
Mix with other ingredients and refrigerate over night
Stir next morning allowing noodles to soften
Will ne ready to serve in afternoon or evening

c99df4226f.gt:
Preheat oven to 425F.
Grease the muffin tins.
Mix, in a medium bowl, cornmeal, flour, sugar, salt, baking powder, and white pepper.
Add cheese and nuts.
In another bowl, whisk the eggs.
Add milk and melted butter.
Mix the dry ingredients into the liquid mixture.
Stir until just combined.
Spoon the batter into prepared muffin tins.
Bake for ten minutes.
Let the muffins sit in the tins for a few minutes before removing.
Let cool on wire racks.
c99df4226f.pred:
1. First, preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the cornmeal, flour, sugar, baking powder, salt, and milk. Mix well.
3. Add the melted butter and mix until the batter is smooth.
4. Fold in the grated cheese and nuts.
5. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
6. Bake the muffins for 15-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the muffins to cool for a few minutes before removing them from the muffin tin.

1fda5d9400.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Grease one 9x5 inch loaf pan.
Cream butter and sugar together.
Beat in eggs one at a time.
Beat smooth.
Stir in milk, vanilla, and almond flavoring.
In large bowl combine flour, baking powder, and salt.
Stir in fruit, raisins, and nuts.
Add all at once to first bowl.
Stir only to moisten.
Turn into greased 9x5x3 inch loaf pan.
Bake for 1 hour in 350 degree F (175 degree C) oven until it tests done.
Let stand 10 minutes.
Remove from pan.
Cool and wrap.

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of chopped nuts (e.g., almonds, walnuts, or pecans)
- 1 cup of raisins
- 1 cup of chopped dried fruit (e.g., cranberries, apricots, or prunes)
- 1 cup of chopped fresh fruit (e.g., apples, pears, or peaches)

- 1/2 cup of olive oil
- 1/2 cup of grated fresh ginger
- 1/2 cup of grated fresh orange zest
- 1/2 cup of grated fresh lemon zest

- 1/2 cup of baking powder
- 1/2 cup of baking soda
- 1/2 cup of salt
- 1/2 cup of unsalted butter
- 1 egg
- 1/2 cup of water

3. Mix the ingredients together until well combined.
4. Pour the batter into a greased loaf pan, and smooth the top with a spatula.
5. Bake the loaf for 1 hour, or until a toothpick inserted in the center comes out clean.

b0d84623b8.gt:
Toss the chicken cubes with taco seasoning.
In a heavy skillet with a tight fitting lid, heat the oil and add the chicken and cook, stirring, until it changes color.
Stir in rice and stir to mix.
Add salsa and water.
Bring to a boil and reduce heat to a simmer.
Cover and allow to cook about 20 minutes.
Remove from heat and allow to stand about 5 minutes before serving.
If you like, you may sprinkle with chopped cilantro.
b0d84623b8.pred:
To cook Mexican Chicken and Rice, follow these steps:

1. Prepare the ingredients:
- 1 lb boneless, skinless chicken breasts
- 1 cup uncooked white rice
- 1 can of diced tomatoes (14.5 oz)
- 1 onion, diced
- 2 cloves of garlic, minced
- 1/2 cup chicken broth
- 1/2 cup water
- 1/4 cup lime juice
- 1/4 cup olive oil
- 1/2 tsp cumin
- 1/2 tsp chili powder
- 1/4 tsp paprika
- Salt and pepper, to taste

2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. In a large skillet, heat the olive oil over medium heat. Add the onion and garlic, and cook until the onion is translucent.
4. Add the chicken to the skillet, and cook until it is browned on all sides. Remove the chicken from the skillet and set aside.
5. In the same skillet, add the diced tomatoes, chicken broth, water, lime juice, cumin, chili powder, paprika, and salt and pepper. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
6. Meanwhile, in a large pot, combine the rice and chicken broth. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low, cover, and simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked and the liquid is absorbed.
7. Combine the cooked chicken and rice in a large bowl, and serve immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Mexican Chicken and Rice!

a89dfedebf.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
Lightly grease cookie sheets.
In a large bowl, cream together the margarine, oil, brown sugar and white sugar until smooth.
Beat in the egg substitute, vanilla and water.
Combine the flour, baking soda, cinnamon and nutmeg; stir into the sugar mixture.
Stir in the oats, oat bran, wheat germ, raisins and walnuts.
Drop by teaspoonfuls onto the prepared cookie sheets.
Bake for 18 to 20 minutes in the preheated oven, or until the edges are lightly browned.
Remove from cookie sheets to cool on wire racks.
a89dfedebf.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the oats, raisins, and baking powder.
5. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until well combined.
6. Drop the dough by rounded tablespoonfuls onto a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
7. Bake for 10-12 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown.
8. Allow the cookies to cool on the baking sheet for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious homemade oatmeal raisin cookies!

e6f5055f34.gt:
Melt butter and cook minced onion in it.
Add rice; brown lightly.
Combine other ingredients with rice mixture and bring to boil.
Cover; reduce heat and steam until liquid is absorbed.
If rice is not done, add more water sparingly.

To make Savory Rice With Mushrooms (Johnny Cash's Mother's Recipe), follow these steps:
1. Rinse the rice in a strainer and drain well.
2. In a large saucepan, heat 2 tablespoons of oil over medium heat. Add the rice and cook, stirring occasionally, until it is lightly browned and fragrant, about 5 minutes.
3. Add 4 cups of water or broth to the saucepan, and bring to a boil. Reduce the heat to low, cover the saucepan, and let the rice simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until the rice is cooked through and the water has been absorbed.
4. While the rice is cooking, heat another 2 tablespoons of oil in a large skillet or wok over medium-high heat. Add the mushrooms and cook until they are tender and slightly browned, about 5 minutes.
5. Once the rice is cooked, add the mushrooms to the rice and stir to combine.
6. Season the rice and mushroom mixture with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
7. Serve the Savory Rice With Mushrooms hot, garnished with fresh herbs if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Savory Rice With Mushrooms (Johnny Cash's Mother's Recipe)!

295fa6c307.gt:
Combine oil and garlic in a small bowl and rub the mushroom caps on all sides with the mixture.
Place caps, top side down, in a circle on an oiled baking sheet.
Season with salt and pepper.
Arrange the cheese, basil, and tomato slices alternately in a circle on top of the mushrooms.
Sprinkle with oregano, if using.
Bake at 450 until the cheese melts, about 3 minutes.

43c305486e.gt:
Combine butter and onion in small microwave-safe dish and cook on high for three minutes or until onion is soft and then stir it to make it sure it is combined.
Beat eggs with sour cream in a small cup or bowl and then pour over onion.
Cook on high about 1 1/2 minutes, stirring several times.
Sprinkle bacon along rim of dish and cook on high for 30 seconds.

- Bacon (preferably sliced)
- Eggs (preferably scrambled)

- Microwave

72392b90a9.gt:
Place steak in a 6" x 9" baking dish.
Combine marinade ingredients; pour over meat.
Cover with plastic; refrigerate 1/2 to 2 hours.
Combine salad ingredients in a bowl; chill until ready to serve.
Remove meat from marinade; pat dry.
Coat grill or broiler pan with cooking spray.
Heat grill on high.
Grill or broil steak 3 minutes on each side for medium-rare.
Transfer to a platter and let rest 10 minutes.
Remove onion from marinade.
Coat a nonstick skillet with cooking spray.
Cook onion over medium-high heat until tender, 5 minutes.
Move to a bowl.
Cut meat thinly.
For lettuce rolls: Layer rice, salad, soybean paste, onions and steak in the center of each lettuce leaf; roll up.
Serve 4 rolls per person.
72392b90a9.pred:
1. Preparation:
- Clean and trim the steak to the desired thickness.
- Cut the lettuce into bite-sized pieces.
- Prepare the steak rolls by placing a piece of steak in the center of each lettuce leaf.
- Season the steak with salt, pepper, and any additional desired seasonings.

2. Cooking:
- Heat a pan or grill over medium-high heat.
- Place the steak rolls on the pan or grill, searing for 2-3 minutes on each side to achieve a nice charred exterior.
- Remove the steak rolls from the pan or grill and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing them into individual servings.

3. Serving:
- Serve the steak rolls with a side of your choice, such as a salad, rice, or potatoes.
- Enjoy your delicious steak in lettuce rolls!

38c1babf26.gt:
In a small bowl combine graham cracker crumbs melted butter and 2 tablespoons of sugar.
After mixing well, press into the bottom of a cheesecake pan; set aside.
In a large bowl, combine room temperature cream cheese, eggs, vanilla, whipping cream and 1 cup sugar.
Beat until smooth and creamy.
Pour batter into the cheesecake pan and cook for 35 to 40 minutes at 350F.
If you like your cheesecake with a sour cream topping, remove from the oven after cooking, then combine 1 pint of sour cream, 2 tablespoons of sugar and 1 teaspoon of vanilla.
Spoon on top of the cheesecake and cook for 10 additional minutes at 420 degrees.
If I am adding fruit to the top of the cheesecake, I do not add the sour cream topping.
For chocolate cheesecake, add a bag of melted chocolate chips to the mixture and use chocolate cookie crumbs for the crust.
The vanilla can be substituted with any flavoring extract.
It is a very flexible basic recipe that can be changed to incorporate any favorite flavor.
38c1babf26.pred:
1. Preparation:
- Crush the graham crackers into a fine crumb using a rolling pin or food processor.
- Melt the butter in a saucepan over low heat.
- Add the crushed graham crackers to the melted butter and mix well.
- Press the mixture evenly into the bottom of a springform pan.
- Bake the crust in a preheated oven at 325°F (163°C) for about 10-12 minutes or until it is set.

2. Cheesecake filling:
- In a large bowl, beat the cream cheese until smooth.
- Add the sugar and vanilla extract and continue to beat until well combined.
- In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs until they are light and fluffy.
- Gradually add the whisked eggs to the cream cheese mixture, mixing well.
- Pour the filling over the baked crust.
- Bake the cheesecake in a preheated oven at 325°F (163°C) for about 45-50 minutes or until the center is set.

3. Cooling and chilling:
- Allow the cheesecake to cool in the oven for about 10-15 minutes.
- Remove the cheesecake from the oven and let it cool completely on a wire rack.
- Chill the cheesecake in the refrigerator for at least 4 hours or overnight.

4. Decoration:
- Once the cheesecake is chilled, remove it from the springform pan and transfer it to a serving plate.
- Dust the top of the cheesecake with powdered sugar or a dusting of cocoa powder.
- Cut the cheesecake into slices and serve.

06e92239ab.gt:

Let sit for at least 20 minutes.
Keep refrigerated.

4ea5a98674.gt:
For the crust: combine the graham cracker crumbs, butter and sugar in a bowl and then press into an ungreased 13x9x2 dish.

Soak the kiriboshi daikon in water and then squeeze it to remove the excess water.

Julienne the carrots.
Cut the bacon into thin strips.

Put into spray bottle and refill as needed.

579917be2c.gt:

4. Once the chicken is cooked, let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
5. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, chicken, and artichoke hearts.
6. In a small bowl, whisk together olive oil, lemon juice, and a pinch of salt and pepper. Pour the dressing over the pasta mixture and toss to combine.
7. Serve the grilled-chicken pasta salad immediately, or refrigerate until ready to serve.

This recipe provides a delicious and healthy meal option, combining the flavors of grilled chicken, pasta, and artichoke hearts. The combination of these ingredients creates a satisfying and well-balanced dish that can be enjoyed by people of all ages.

b653472a7b.gt:
In soup pot dissolve curry paste with water , add cherry tomato ,bring to the boil on medium heat
Prepare banana blossom while soup is boiling ,cut half on runny water or in water bowl
Cut into 4 pieces ,now select only white leaves,take off small young banana inside
Cut to small pieces, this always soak in water to prevent from color change
Add to soup pot,increase to high heat ,stir to let all sink in hot boil soup ,let it simmer about 15 mins
Add fishsauce,add green leaves ,stir to mix,heat off ,serve hot with sticky rice by northern thai way or with steamed jasmine rice

Press dough into a 20 x 29cm greased baking tray
Mark the slices lightly and prick with a fork
Bake at 150C for 50 minutes
Once baked, drench the shortbread with castor sugar
Cut the shortbread into squares
Allow to cool and then enjoy
