Cook on low for five minutes or until blueberries are mostly liquid (there will be some remaining chunks of blueberries).

Remove from heat, pour mixture into a bowl and place in fridge until cool (about 1 hour).

Remove blueberry mixture from fridge, mix in creme fraiche.

Pour blueberry creme fraiche mixture into ice cream maker, following machine instructions.

f12ad1f38c.gt:
1.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees.

Slice the chicken in half lengthwise to create a pocket.

Fill the chicken with the cheese mixture and place into a greased baking dish.

Brush the tops of the chicken breasts with oil and sprinkle with a bit of salt and pepper.

Bake the chicken for 45-55 minutes, or until cooked through and no longer pink.

Top the chicken with pasta sauce of your choice.

Mix all the ingredients.

020aa88369.gt:
Halve dough.
Roll out both to 34cm X 30cm.
Leave to rise for 10 minutes.
Carefully spread each one with 1 TBSP of vegemite, coating all the dough.
Sprinkle the grated cheese over the bases, keeping some for sprinkling on the top.
Roll the dough from the 34cm end loosely til you have a sausage.
Slice into 10 pieces and arrange on baking tray, loosening them up a little.
Sprinkle remaining cheese on the scrolls.
Bake at 200.C for about 20 minutes.
I always check after 10 to see how they are going.
Enjoy!
020aa88369.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine 1 cup of grated cheese, 1/2 cup of butter, 1/2 cup of flour, 1/2 cup of milk, 1 egg, 1/2 tsp of salt, and 1/4 tsp of black pepper. Mix well.

064cb6c3cf.gt:

Preheat oven to 400F.
Stir together salt, allspice, and cayenne.
Pat pork dry and sprinkle spice rub all over pork, pressing to adhere.

d069fb1925.gt:
Cut off the stem of the shiitake mushrooms and cut into bite size pieces.
Put water and the seasoning ingredients in a pot and let it boil.
Then, add the shiitake mushrooms, cover with a drop lid, and cook it for about 10 minutes on low heat.
Stir the pot sometimes.
Take off the drop lid when the liquid boils down and remove from the heat when the liquid has almost gone.
When it has cooled down a little, it is done.
You can keep it in the fridge for about 3 days so make some and keep it for bento lunch box.
It will be an extra dish for dinner if you keep some in the fridge.

- Salt

4. Serve the dish:
- Serve the cooked mushrooms on a plate, garnished with a sprinkle of salt and sugar if desired.

By following these steps, you will be able to create a delicious Salted and Sweetened Shiitake Mushroom dish.

7a20842b45.gt:
Preheat oven to 350 degrees F. In a large bowl using an electric mixer or stand mixer, beat butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
Add eggs, one at a time.
Add vanilla.
In another bowl, sift together the flour, baking powder and salt.
Add the flour mixture and bananas to the butter mixture in the mixer, alternating between the two.
Line each muffin cup with a paper liner.
Fill each muffin cups about 2/3 full with batter and bake for 17-20 minutes until a tester inserted into a cupcake comes out clean.
Remove from the oven and let cool on a wire rack.
Let cupcakes cool completely before frosting.
For the frosting, using an electric mixer or stand mixer, cream butter until light and fluffy.
Add confectioners sugar 1/2 cup at a time, beating well after each addition.
Add vanilla and milk and beat until frosting is well combined.
Add in strawberry preserves 1 tablespoon at a time until frosting is creamy.
Frost cooled cupcakes and store in the refrigerator.

415a9b7161.gt:
Preheat the oven to 350F and line a 6-cup muffin pan.
Place the butter in a small saucepan over medium heat and cook until the aroma is nutty and the milk solids start to turn brown on the bottom of the pan, about 5 minutes.
With a spatula, transfer the browned butter into a large mixing bowl.
Add the brown and white sugars, eggs and vanilla to the bowl and mix until combined.
Whisk together the flour, ground hazelnuts, baking powder and salt.
Pour the dry ingredients into the browned butter mixture and mix until fully incorporated.
Gently fold in the raspberries.
Spoon the muffin batter into the paper cups.
Scatter the tops with a few of the cracked hazelnuts, while gently pressing them securely into place.
Bake for 15-18 minutes, until a cake tester inserted in the center comes out clean.
Let the muffins cool briefly in the pan, and then place them on a wire rack to cool.
415a9b7161.pred:
To cook the Hazelnut-Brown Butter Muffins with Raspberries, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, salt, and sugar.
3. In a separate bowl, whisk the eggs, milk, and melted butter.
4. Gradually add the wet ingredients to the dry ingredients, stirring until just combined.
5. Fold in the raspberries and chopped hazelnuts.
6. Pour the batter into a greased muffin tin, filling each cup about 3/4 full.
7. Bake for 18-20 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center of a muffin comes out clean.
8. Allow the muffins to cool in the pan for a few minutes before transferring them to a wire rack to cool completely.

Enjoy your delicious Hazelnut-Brown Butter Muffins with Raspberries!

615e73ba74.gt:
The best way to capture the elusive flavor of summertime.
Ben and Jerry prefer small peaches because they have more flavor and less water than the larger ones.
Combine the peaches, 1/2 cup of the sugar, and the lemon juice in a bowl.
Cover and refrigerate for 2 hours, stirring the mixture every 30 minutes.
Remove the peaches from the refrigerator and drain the juice into another bowl.
Return the peaches to the refrigerator.
Whisk the eggs in a mixing bowl until light and fluffy, 1 to 2 minutes.
Whisk in the remaining 3/4 cup sugar, a little at a time, then continue whisking until completely blended, about 1 minute more.
Pour in the cream and milk and whisk to blend.
Add the peach juice and blend.
Transfer the mixture to an ice cream maker and freeze following manufacturer's instructions.
After the ice cream stiffens (about 2 minutes before if is done) add the peaches, then continue freezing until the ice cream is ready.
Makes 1 generous quart.
615e73ba74.pred:
1. Preparation:
- Gather all necessary ingredients, including Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream, peaches, and any additional toppings or garnishes you prefer.
- Ensure that the ice cream is at a suitable temperature for scooping.
- Wash and peel the peaches, and slice them into bite-sized pieces.
- Prepare any additional toppings or garnishes, such as whipped cream, nuts, or a drizzle of sauce.

2. Scooping:
- Using a suitable ice cream scoop, scoop the desired amount of Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream into a bowl or a dish.
- If desired, add a small amount of peach slices to the scooped ice cream.
- Gently mix the ice cream and peach slices together.

3. Serving:
- Transfer the ice cream mixture to a bowl or a dish, and garnish with additional toppings or sauce, if desired.
- Serve immediately, and enjoy your delicious Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream creation.

4. Variations:
- If you prefer a different flavor of ice cream, you can easily substitute Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream with another flavor of your choice.
- You can also experiment with different toppings and garnishes to create a unique and personalized ice cream treat.

Remember to always follow proper food safety guidelines and enjoy your homemade Ben and Jerry's Fresh Georgia Peach Ice Cream creation responsibly.

0a605c19e8.gt:
Add everything but the shrimp to a gallon-sized freezer bag.
Seal the bag and shake well to combine.
Taste test for spiciness; add sriracha for more heat, and tomato paste and olive oil for less heat.
When youre happy with it, add the shrimp and marinate in the fridge for 45 minutes.
Dump the entire bag, marinade included, into a pre-heated frying pan.
Fry the shrimp until theyre curled up and no longer translucent, a couple of minutes on each side.
You can also skewer and grill the shrimp.
Serve over rice, pasta, udon, in lettuce wraps with carrot and sprouts, as an appetizer ...
0a605c19e8.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: shrimp, sriracha sauce, vegetable oil, and a small amount of salt and pepper.
2. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
3. In a small bowl, mix the sriracha sauce with a small amount of vegetable oil to create a marinade.
4. Season the shrimp with salt and pepper, then coat them in the sriracha marinade.
5. Heat the vegetable oil in a large skillet or frying pan over medium-high heat.
6. Carefully add the shrimp to the skillet, being cautious not to overcrowd the pan. Cook the shrimp for about 2-3 minutes, or until they are cooked through and the shells are pink.
7. Remove the shrimp from the skillet and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
8. Place the baking sheet in the preheated oven and cook for an additional 2-3 minutes, or until the shrimp are cooked through and the shells are crispy.
9. Serve the Sriracha Fried Shrimp immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Sriracha Fried Shrimp!

2893fcfb35.gt:
Heat a medium skillet over medium-high heat.
Spray with nonstick cooking spray.
Add the diced onion and saute until tender, about 5 minutes.
Add the diced apple and saute until tender, about 3 minutes.
Then remove from heat and set aside for the moment.
In a medium sized mixing bowl, melt the butter (you can do this in the microwave, heating for 30 seconds, stirring, then heating for additional 30 second increments if needed).
Then add the bread crumbs to the melted butter and toss to coat.
Into the bread crumb mixture, mix in the onion and apple.
Add the shredded cheese and mix to thoroughly combine.
Slice the pork chops lengthwise leaving about 1/2 an inch on one side still intact (you are basically making a pocket for the filling mixture).
Stuff pork chops with bread crumb mixture.
Secure the pork chops closed using toothpicks.
Spray each side of the pork chops with nonstick cooking spray and season with salt and pepper.
Grill the pork chops (or cook on a skillet) over medium to medium high heat until the juices run clear, about 20-25 minutes.
Remove from the grill and let rest about 5 minutes.
Remove toothpicks.
Serve and enjoy!
!
2893fcfb35.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Season the pork chops with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
3. In a large skillet, heat some oil over medium heat. Add the sliced onions and cook until they are soft and translucent.
4. Add the sliced apples and cook until they are tender.
5. Remove the onions and apples from the skillet and set aside.
6. In the same skillet, heat some more oil over medium heat. Add the pork chops and cook until they are browned on both sides.
7. Add the cooked onions and apples back to the skillet, and stir to combine.
8. Place the pork chops back in the skillet, and pour in some water or broth to cover the pork chops.
9. Cover the skillet with a lid and cook in the oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the pork chops are cooked through and the internal temperature reaches 145°F (63°C).
10. Remove the pork chops from the oven and let them rest for a few minutes before slicing and serving.

[/SYS]

0ede22d38c.gt:
Chop onion and celery.
Saute celery and onion in vegetable oil in a 2-quart saucepan over medium heat until tender.
Add chicken stock and frozen vegetables.
Cover and cook until vegetables are cooked, about 10 minutes.
If vegetables are too large, you may wish to cut them into smaller pieces.
Stir in cream of chicken soup, chicken and milk and heat through, stirring occasionally.
Cut cheese into chunks and add to soup, stirring until melted.
Taste and season if needed.
(It shouldnt need much if any salt.)
Serve immediately with crackers.
0ede22d38c.pred:
1. Preparation:
- Gather the following ingredients: potatoes, onions, celery, carrots, chicken, tomatoes, green beans, and a chicken broth base.
- Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces.
- Peel and chop the potatoes, onions, celery, carrots, and green beans into similar-sized pieces.
- Wash and chop the tomatoes.
- In a large pot, cook the chicken broth base over medium heat.
- Add the chopped potatoes, onions, celery, carrots, and green beans to the pot.
- Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and simmer for 20-25 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender.
- Add the chopped tomatoes to the pot and continue to simmer for an additional 5-10 minutes, or until the tomatoes are cooked through.
- Season the soup with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
- Serve the Chunky Chowder hot.

2. Tips and Variations:
- You can add additional ingredients such as corn, clams, or bacon to enhance the flavor of the Chunky Chowder.
- You can also use a different type of broth base, such as a vegetable or chicken broth, to suit your taste preferences.
- To make the soup creamier, you can add a dollop of sour cream or a spoonful of heavy cream before serving.
- You can also serve the Chunky Chowder with a side of crusty bread or a salad for a complete meal.

[/INST]

dd8991d2f0.gt:
Bring water for noodles to boil in a large pot.
Cook noodles according to instructions on package, then drain and set aside.
In a large skillet, heat olive oil, and then add onion.
Saute onions for 10-15 minutes, over medium-low heat until lightly browned.
Add broccoli and 1/4 cup water.
Cover pan and saute 5 minutes or so until broccoli turns bright green and begins to soften.
Stir in garlic and salt.
Then stir in sesame oil, agave and ume vinegar.
In a small bowl, combine arrowroot and 1 tablespoon water, stirring vigorously to make a paste without any lumps.
Pour the paste over the broccoli and mix quickly and vigorously to loosen any of the mixture that sticks to the bottom of the pan.
Place noodles on individual plates, then top with broccoli mixture.
Garnish with scallions, cilantro and peanuts.
dd8991d2f0.pred:
1. In a large pot or wok, heat some oil over medium heat.
2. Add in some minced garlic and ginger, and cook for a few seconds until fragrant.
3. Add in some tofu, stirring to ensure it is evenly coated with the oil and garlic-ginger mixture.
4. Add in some vegetables, such as bell peppers, carrots, and onions, and cook for a few minutes until they are slightly tender.
5. Pour in some vegetable broth, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Add in some rice noodles, and stir to combine.
7. Add in some soy sauce, fish sauce, and a pinch of sugar, and stir to combine.
8. Cook the noodles and vegetables for a few more minutes, until the noodles are cooked through and the sauce has thickened.
9. Serve the Vegetarian Pad Thai hot, garnished with some chopped peanuts and cilantro.

[/INST]

[/SYS]

6902fabddb.gt: Stir salt, pepper, paprika, garlic powder, onion powder, and cayenne pepper in an airtight container, seal, and shake to combine.
6902fabddb.pred:
[/SYS]

[INST]
To make Homemade Seasoned Salt, follow these steps:
1. In a small bowl, mix together 1/4 cup of kosher salt, 1/4 cup of granulated sugar, 1/4 cup of black peppercorns, and 1/4 cup of freshly ground black pepper.
2. Combine the ingredients in a small jar, making sure to shake the mixture well to ensure even distribution of the seasonings.
3. Store the seasoned salt in a cool, dry place, away from direct sunlight and heat sources.

e766664a53.gt:
Heat the oven to 450 degrees F with a rack in the middle position.
Take a small slice off of the bottom of each potato so that they will sit flat, and then a small slice (about 1/4) from each end.
Make slices crosswise down the potato at 1/4 intervals, leaving 1/4 at the bottom.
Make sure you do not cut all the way through.
Rinse the sliced potatoes under cold running water, making sure water gets between each slice to wash away excess starch.
Place the potatoes on a plate, bottom side up, and microwave for 5 minutes (do not cover).
Flip the potatoes over, then microwave for another 5 minutes.
While the potatoes are in the microwave, make the topping.
Pulse the bread in a food processor until you have coarsely ground crumbs.
In a medium bowl, use a fork to mix the crumbs with the melted butter, cheddar cheese, Parmesan cheese, paprika, garlic powder, oregano, minced garlic, salt, and pepper until it forms a chunky paste.
Set aside.
When the potatoes are finished in the microwave, place them on a rimmed baking sheet.
Drizzle slowly with olive oil, so that it can run into the slices.
Fan the slices slightly, then dash each one with paprika, garlic powder, oregano, salt, and pepper.
Bake for 30 minutes, until the potatoes are cooked through and the edges are just starting to brown.
Remove from the oven and turn the broiler on.
Press the topping onto the top of the cooked potatoes, pressing into any slices that you easily can, but being careful not to rip the potatoes.
Place under the broiler for a couple of minutes, until the topping is bubbly and starting to brown.
e766664a53.pred:
To recreate the flavor packed potato fans, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into thin slices.
3. Place the potato slices on a baking sheet, making sure they are not overlapping.
4. Drizzle the potato slices with olive oil, and season them with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
5. Roast the potatoes in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are golden brown and crispy on the outside.
6. Remove the potatoes from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Carefully use a spatula or tongs to lift the potato slices from the baking sheet and transfer them to a serving plate.
8. Serve the flavor packed potato fans immediately, and enjoy!

[/SYS]

84dcc3c2e0.gt:
Combine all the ingredients in a cocktail shaker with a few ice cubes and shake vigorously.
Pour into a chilled cocktail glass and garnish with a wedge of lime.
84dcc3c2e0.pred:
As a chef, I would first gather all the necessary ingredients for the Key Lime Martini, which typically includes key lime juice, vodka, triple sec, and a small amount of simple syrup. I would then prepare the ingredients by squeezing the key limes, measuring the other liquors, and mixing the simple syrup.

Next, I would pour the key lime juice into a cocktail shaker filled with ice. I would then add the vodka and triple sec, and shake the mixture vigorously for about 15-20 seconds. This will help to chill the drink and create a smooth consistency.

After shaking, I would strain the mixture into a glass filled with ice. The drink should be served immediately, as the ice will help to keep the drink cold and refreshing.

In summary, to cook the Key Lime Martini, I would gather the necessary ingredients, prepare the mixture, shake it, strain it, and serve it in a glass filled with ice.

b240a9e8bb.gt:
Heat oven to 250F degrees.
Mix together cornmeal, flour, sugar, and baking powder.
Combine egg whites, milk and margarine, mix well.
Pour milk mixture into the dry ingredients, stir until just smooth (do not over mix).
In a large non stick skillet heat the 2 tbsp oil, heat until quite hot but not smoking.
Drop in a 1/4 cup of batter for each fritter.
Cook approx 4-6 minutes on each side.
Keep warm in the oven covered with foil until you have cooked all the fritters.
Serve with Blueberries or other fruit.

704ac085bf.gt:
Get the 2 slices of bread and the peanut butter and banana.
Spread the peanut butter on one of the slices of bread.
Slice up as much banna as the bread can fit on it.
Place the two slices of bread together.
And now it is ready to eat.
704ac085bf.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients: peanut butter, bananas, bread, and a knife.
2. Spread peanut butter on one side of the bread.
3. Slice the banana into thin pieces.
4. Place the banana slices on the other side of the bread, creating a sandwich.
5. Cut the sandwich in half or in diagonal slices, depending on your preference.
6. Enjoy your delicious Peanut Butter and Banana Sandwich!

1090169845.gt:
Preheat the over to 400F.
Divide the fish into 2 portions placing each in the center of a piece of foil (spraying the foil with some cooking oil is a good idea).
Salt and pepper to taste.
To each portion add pieces of pinched-off-the-stem fresh dill, a splash of lemon juice (or a slice of lemon) and half a pat of butter (optional).
Fold the foil into a packet by folding the edges up until they meet over the center and folding over to seal.
Put the packets in an oven dish and bake for 15 minutes.
Remove and serve.

b5d5eda997.gt:
Preheat oven to 325F
mix cake in bowl...following the directions on the box.
add jell-o pudding
add strawberry extract
add 1\2 can of strawberry frosting
pour mixture in a floured cake pan.
I used a bundt pan
bake for 35 to 40 minutes or until toothpick comes out clean.
once cake has cooled, take the un-used portion of the frosting and microwave for 10 seconds.
stir and drizzle with spoon over cake
b5d5eda997.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large mixing bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until light and fluffy.
3. Add the eggs one at a time, mixing well after each addition.
4. In a separate bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, and salt. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the wet mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
5. Pour the batter into a greased and floured 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
6. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.

8. While the cake is cooling, prepare the strawberry topping. In a small saucepan, combine the strawberries, sugar, and cornstarch. Cook over medium heat, stirring constantly, until the mixture thickens and bubbles.

10. Slice the cake into wedges and serve.

820cb37cdd.gt:
1.
Brown the onion in the olive oil until turning translucent.
Add the garlic.
2.
Add both sausage and beef, break into very small pieces and cook through.
3.
Add spices and seasonings, remove from heat.
Drain and cool.
In a food processor, add ricotta cheese, Parmesan cheese, egg, and the sausage/ground beef mixture.
Process together until it reaches an almost paste-like consistency.
Refrigerate until ready to use.
Can also be frozen.
820cb37cdd.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:
1. Cook the pasta according to the package instructions. Typically, this involves boiling the pasta until it is al dente.
2. While the pasta is cooking, prepare the sausage and beef filling. This can be done by browning the sausage in a pan, and then adding the beef to the pan. Cook the beef until it is fully cooked, breaking it up into smaller pieces as it cooks.

4. In a large bowl, combine the cooked pasta, sausage, and beef filling. Mix well to ensure that the ingredients are evenly distributed.

b9b1d42894.gt:
Combine first 6 ingredients.
Pour mixture over chicken in slow cooker.
Cook 3-4 hours on low.
Serve with no-yolk egg noodles.
Number of Servings: 4.
b9b1d42894.pred:
To cook the Bacon Ranch Slow Cooker Chicken, follow these steps:
1. Preheat your slow cooker on low heat setting.
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
3. Place the chicken breasts in the slow cooker, making sure they are evenly distributed.
4. In a small bowl, mix together the ranch dressing, bacon bits, and any additional seasonings you prefer.
5. Pour the ranch dressing mixture over the chicken in the slow cooker.
6. Cook the chicken in the slow cooker for 6-8 hours, or until it reaches the desired level of doneness.
7. Remove the chicken from the slow cooker and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into bite-sized pieces.
8. Serve the Bacon Ranch Slow Cooker Chicken hot, garnished with additional ranch dressing, if desired.

This recipe combines the flavors of ranch dressing, bacon, and chicken to create a delicious and satisfying meal. The slow cooker method ensures that the chicken is tender and juicy, while the ranch dressing adds a creamy and tangy element to the dish.

1c2ae05e91.gt:
Cook/steam sliced carrots until fork-tender; drain and keep warm.
Preheat oven to 375.
Lightly grease/spray a 2 1/2 qt casserole dish; set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine the melted butter, onion, cheese soup, milk, egg, cheese, crushed crackers, salt, pepper, tarragon and nutmeg; mix well.
Gently fold in the hot cooked carrots to the mixture.
Turn mixture into prepared casserole dish.
Bake, uncovered at 375 for 25-30 minutes.
1c2ae05e91.pred:
To recreate the Cheddar Carrot Bake, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. Prepare a 9x9 inch baking dish by greasing it with butter or non-stick spray.
3. In a large bowl, mix together the grated carrots, shredded cheddar cheese, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
4. In a separate bowl, whisk together the eggs, milk, and a pinch of salt and pepper.
5. Pour the egg mixture over the carrot and cheese mixture in the baking dish.
6. Bake the Cheddar Carrot Bake in the preheated oven for 25-30 minutes, or until the edges are golden brown and the center is set.
7. Allow the dish to cool for a few minutes before serving.

Enjoy your delicious Cheddar Carrot Bake!

8dfa9a04cc.gt:
In shallow bowl, mix flour, egg, vanilla, milk, and lemon jce.
Dip rings to cover.
In deep skillet heat oil to about 375*.
Fry rings, in batches of 3 or 4 for 2 1/2 minutes or until golden brown.
Place on paper towels and dust with sugar on both sides.

8c25573d0e.gt:
In a mixing bowl, cream butter and sugar until fluffy.
Beat in flour.
Cover and refrigerate for 1 hour.
Roll out onto a well-floured surface to 1/4-in.
thickness.
Brush lightly with egg.
Sprinkle with almonds and sugar if desired.
Using a fluted pastry cutter or knife, cut into 2-in.
x 1-in.
strips.
Place 1 inches apart on ungreased baking sheets.
Bake at 350 degrees F for 10-12 minute or until lightly browned.
Cool on wire racks.
8c25573d0e.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

2. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, almonds, sugar, and salt.
3. Add the butter and mix until the dough comes together.

87f97ac544.gt:
Preheat oven to 350A.
Slice ham in half.
If using slices of cheese, cut in quarters.
Roll desired amount of ham and cheese up in each biscuit.
Use toothpick to hold in place.
Bake 15 minutes or until golden brown.
Feel free to stuff these with almost anything!

b188749dcd.gt:
Combine fennel seeds, cumin seeds, caraway seeds, cracked wheat, butter or margarine, molasses or barley malt, and orange zest in 1 1/3 cup of boiling water.
Soak for 1 hour.

Select the cycle for White Bread and the Light Crust setting.
Start.
b188749dcd.pred:

3. Cut the Limpa bread into desired sizes, such as slices or smaller pieces.

adf0775fd4.gt:
Bring a large saucepan of salted water to a boil.
Fill a large bowl with ice water.
In another large bowl, whisk the shallot, vinegar and sour cream together.
Whisk in the olive oil until emulsified.
Season with salt and pepper.
Add the sugar snap peas to the boiling water and blanch for 20 seconds.
Add the snow peas and cook for 20 seconds.
Add the frozen baby peas and cook for 20 seconds longer, until the sugar snaps and snow peas are crisp-tender and the baby peas are heated through.
Drain and immediately transfer the colander to the ice water to stop the cooking.
Drain again and pat the peas dry.
Add the peas to the dressing, season with salt and pepper and toss to coat.
Serve.

To cook the Three-Pea Salad, follow these steps:

1. Wash and pick through the peas to remove any debris or inedible parts.
2. In a large bowl, combine the washed peas, cherry tomatoes, and a small amount of olive oil.
3. Add a pinch of salt and pepper, and toss the ingredients to coat them evenly.
4. Allow the salad to sit for a few minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
5. Serve the Three-Pea Salad immediately, or refrigerate it for later consumption.

This simple yet delicious salad is perfect for a light meal or as a side dish. The combination of peas, cherry tomatoes, and olive oil creates a refreshing and healthy dish that can be enjoyed by everyone.

68d4e3063b.gt:
Preheat oven to 400F
Clean wing sections, salt and pepper, I stay light on the salt because the sauce adds some also.
Spread wings out on baking sheet, place in preheated oven for about 45 minutes.
About 5 minutes before the wings are done, in a small container (I use a coffee mug) mix the sauce ingredients.
I put a little sauce in a big enough bowl to hold the wings and mix them.
Add about 1/3 wings, about 1/3 sauce, same thing twice more.
I find that just makes it easier to evenly coat the wings.
If you want to add a little chart to the coating, you can broil the wings for a minute per side, keep an eye on them do you don't over do it.
My daughter does not like it that way, so we skip this step when she is home.
Serve immediately.
68d4e3063b.pred:
To recreate the culinary masterpiece, you will need the following ingredients:
- Chicken wings
- Ranch dressing
- Soy sauce
- Honey
- Garlic
- Ginger
- Sesame seeds
- Green onions
- Red pepper flakes

First, marinate the chicken wings in a mixture of soy sauce, honey, garlic, ginger, and sesame seeds for at least 2 hours.
Next, toss the marinated chicken wings in a mixture of green onions and red pepper flakes.
Then, heat a pan or grill and cook the chicken wings until they are fully cooked and slightly charred.
Finally, drizzle the cooked chicken wings with ranch dressing and serve immediately.

Please note that these instructions are based on the image provided and may not be the exact recipe used by Heidi.

c813791325.gt:
In a food processor, combine the garlic and cucumber and process until finely minced.
Add the yogurt, sour cream, lemon juice, dill and salt and pepper to taste.
Process until well blended, then transfer to a bowl.
Taste to adjust the seasonings if needed.
Cover and refrigerate until needed (recipe yields 1 cup).
c813791325.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 400°F (200°C).
2. Wash and peel the eggplant, then cut it into thin slices.
3. Spread the eggplant slices on a baking sheet, and drizzle them with olive oil.
4. Season the eggplant slices with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.
5. Bake the eggplant slices in the preheated oven for 20-25 minutes, or until they are tender and slightly crispy.
6. Remove the baked eggplant slices from the oven, and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Serve the baked eggplant fries as a delicious vegan snacktime treat.

[/SYS]

91462bb341.gt:
Preheat oven to 400.
Combine bread crumbs, Italian seasoning and garlic powder in shallow dish.
Dip chicken in egg, then crumb mixture; turn to coat.
Arrange chicken in 13 x 9-inch baking dish.
Bake 20 minutes.
Pour Sauce over chicken; top with cheese.
Bake an additional 10 minutes or until chicken is thoroughly cooked.
Serve over spaghetti.
91462bb341.pred:
To cook the oven baked chicken Parmesan, follow these steps:

1. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. Season the chicken breasts with salt, pepper, and any other desired seasonings.
3. Dip the chicken breasts in beaten eggs, then in breadcrumbs, ensuring they are evenly coated.
4. Heat some oil in a large skillet or oven-safe pan over medium-high heat. Add the chicken breasts and cook until they are golden brown on both sides, about 3-4 minutes per side.
5. Remove the chicken from the skillet and place it on a baking sheet or a lined baking tray.
6. Spread a layer of marinara sauce on top of the chicken breasts.
7. Top the chicken with a layer of mozzarella cheese.
8. Return the skillet to the oven and bake the chicken for 10-12 minutes or until the cheese is melted and bubbly.
9. Remove the chicken from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into portions.

Enjoy your delicious oven baked chicken Parmesan!

88e444eb93.gt:
Preheat oven to broil.
Line a baking sheet with foil.
Halve the green bell pepper, red bell pepper, jalapeno peppers, and serrano peppers lengthwise and discard stems and seeds.
Place on baking sheet and brush the peppers with olive oil.
Roast peppers under the broiler until the skin blackens and blisters, 3 to 5 minutes.
Place peppers in a bowl and cover with plastic wrap; allow the peppers to steam until the skins loosen, about 10 minutes.
Peel skin off the peppers and discard.
Combine the green bell pepper, red bell pepper, jalapenos, serrano, onion, tomato, garlic, cilantro, diced tomato with juice, lime juice, salt, black pepper, and beer in a blender.
Blend to desired consistency.
Transfer to a bowl and allow to cool in the refrigerator for 30 minutes before serving.
88e444eb93.pred:
1. Gather the necessary ingredients:
- 1/2 cup of olive oil
- 1/2 cup of red wine vinegar
- 1/2 cup of salsa
- 1/2 cup of sugar
- 1/2 cup of water
- 1/2 cup of diced tomatoes
- 1/2 cup of diced onions
- 1/2 cup of diced bell peppers
- 1/2 cup of diced jalapenos
- Salt and pepper to taste
- 1/2 cup of chopped cilantro
- 1/2 cup of chopped parsley

2. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
3. In a large bowl, combine the olive oil, red wine vinegar, salsa, sugar, water, and seasonings. Mix well.
4. Add the diced tomatoes, onions, bell peppers, jalapenos, salt, and pepper to the bowl. Mix well.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish or roasting pan.
6. Roast the dish in the preheated oven for about 30-45 minutes, or until the vegetables are tender and the sauce has thickened.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes.
8. Stir in the chopped cilantro and parsley.
9. Serve the Drunken Roasted Salsa immediately, or let it cool and refrigerate for later use.

Enjoy your delicious Drunken Roasted Salsa!

a0b7c1096b.gt:
Strain plums through a sieve over a bowl, reserving juice.
Cut plums in half; discard pits.
Combine plums, reserved juice, red wine, honey, cinnamon, and cloves in a medium saucepan.
Bring to a boil.
Cover; reduce heat, and simmer 15 minutes.
Place half of soup in a blender; process until smooth.
Pour into a bowl.
Repeat procedure with other half of soup.
Stir in liqueur and rind.
Place 3/4 cup soup into each of 6 wine goblets.
Top each serving with 1 tablespoon yogurt and 1 mint sprig, if desired.
a0b7c1096b.pred:
1. Start by washing and peeling the winter plums.
2. Cut the plums into small pieces and place them in a large pot.
3. Add 2 cups of water to the pot, and bring it to a boil.
4. Reduce the heat and let the plums simmer for about 15-20 minutes, or until they become soft and tender.
5. Remove the plums from the heat and let them cool for a few minutes.
6. Carefully remove the skin from the plums, and discard it.
7. Place the plums back into the pot, and add 1 cup of water.
8. Bring the pot back to a boil, and then reduce the heat to a simmer.
9. Cook the plums for about 10-15 minutes, or until they become soft and mushy.
10. Remove the pot from the heat, and let the soup cool for a few minutes.
11. Carefully transfer the soup to a blender or food processor, and blend it until smooth.
12. Return the soup to the pot, and add a pinch of salt and pepper to taste.
13. Serve the Winter Plum Soup hot, and enjoy!

[/INST]

27dd242a7a.gt:
Mix first 6 ingredients together and place in an oven proof casserole dish.
Sprinkle cheese on top and bake for 15 to 20 minutes at 350.
Serve hot over chips,this isn't very good cold.
27dd242a7a.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients for the dip, which include sour cream, mayonnaise, cheddar cheese, and a variety of herbs and spices.
2. Preheat the oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the sour cream, mayonnaise, and cheddar cheese.
4. Add the herbs and spices to the mixture, ensuring that they are evenly distributed.
5. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the dip is bubbly and the cheese is melted and slightly browned.
6. Remove the baking dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.

This appetizing meal can be served with a variety of dipping options, such as pita chips, tortilla chips, or even carrot sticks. Enjoy!

8b290d6b5c.gt:
Preheat oven to 330 degrees F (165C).
Butter and flour a 10 inch bundt pan.
Combine flour, baking powder, soda, cinnamon, nutmeg and salt.
In large bowl, cream butter with sugar until light and fluffy (no less than 6 minutes).
Add eggs; beat until smooth.
Add flour mixture alternately with yoghurt (or sour cream); beat until smooth.
Pour batter into prepared pan.
Bake about 1 hour, or until tester comes out with a few moist crumbs attached.
Preheat broiler.
Combine brown sugar, butter, almonds, coconut, milk and vanilla.
Spoon mixture over top of cake.
Place under broiler, 3 inches from heat source until lightly browned.
WATCH VERY CAREFULLY as this can go from caramelly to burned in no time!
8b290d6b5c.pred:
To prepare the spice cake, follow these steps:
1. Preheat the oven to 350°F (180°C).
2. Grease and flour a 9-inch (23cm) round cake pan.
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the flour, baking powder, baking soda, cinnamon, nutmeg, and salt.
4. In a separate bowl, beat the eggs and sugar until light and fluffy.
5. Gradually add the oil to the egg mixture, then mix in the vanilla extract.
6. Gradually add the dry ingredients to the egg mixture, alternating with the milk, and mix until just combined.
7. Pour the batter into the prepared cake pan and smooth the top with a spatula.
8. Bake the cake for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
9. Allow the cake to cool in the pan for 10 minutes, then transfer it to a wire rack to cool completely.
10. Once the cake is cooled, use a spatula to spread a layer of frosting or glaze over the top.
11. Serve the spice cake to enjoy its delicious flavor and texture.

[/INST]

0349f80c73.gt:
Mix all ingredients (using a hand mixer will get the lumps out).
Chill.
Serve!

To cook the mystery dish, "One More Spinach Dip," you will need the following ingredients:
- 1 cup of spinach
- 1/2 cup of sour cream
- 1/2 cup of mayonnaise
- 1/2 cup of grated cheese (such as cheddar or Monterey Jack)
- 1/4 cup of chopped onion
- 1/4 cup of chopped bell pepper
- 1/4 cup of chopped mushrooms
- 1/4 cup of chopped tomatoes
- 1/4 cup of crushed corn chips
- 1/4 cup of crushed tortilla chips
- Salt and pepper, to taste
- Optional: a pinch of cumin or paprika

To prepare the dish, follow these steps:
1. In a large bowl, combine the spinach, sour cream, mayonnaise, grated cheese, onion, bell pepper, mushrooms, tomatoes, corn chips, tortilla chips, salt, and pepper. Mix well.
2. Taste the dip and adjust the seasoning as needed.
3. Transfer the dip to a serving bowl and refrigerate for at least 30 minutes to allow the flavors to meld together.
4. Serve the "One More Spinach Dip" with tortilla chips, pita chips, or even crackers for dipping.

Enjoy your delicious "One More Spinach Dip!"

3a73e25c27.gt:
Preheat oven to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C).
Crumble the sausage into a saucepan over low heat; cover and cook until sausage is completely browned, stirring every 30 seconds; drain.
Place the bread on a baking sheet with the crust sides down.
Arrange the cooked sausage evenly over both halves of bread.
Top each with tomato slices, red bell pepper strips, mozzarella slices, green olives, and black olives.
Bake in preheated oven for 10 minutes.
Whisk together the olive oil, balsamic vinegar, oregano, basil, salt, pepper, onion, and garlic in a bowl.
Drizzle over baked bread halves.
Bake another 5 minutes.
Cut into 2 inch slices to serve.
3a73e25c27.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 375°F (190°C).
2. In a large bowl, mix together the sausage, breadcrumbs, garlic, salt, and pepper.
3. Shape the mixture into small balls, and place them on a baking sheet lined with parchment paper.
4. Bake the sausage balls in the preheated oven for 15-20 minutes, or until they are golden brown and cooked through.
5. While the sausage balls are baking, prepare the dipping sauce by mixing together the mayonnaise, mustard, and minced garlic.
6. Once the sausage balls are cooked, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
7. Serve the sausage balls with the dipping sauce for a delicious and appetizing meal.

[/INST]

68fde60a06.gt:
In Dutch oven, place beef, onion, garlic, salt and pepper.
Combine water and tomato paste; pour over beef mixture.
Bring to a boil; reduce heat to low.
Cover tightly and simmer 1 3/4 to 2 hours or until beef is tender.
Remove beef from cooking liquid; cool slightly.
Meanwhile skim fat from cooking liquid, if necessary.
Trim and discard excess fat from cooked beef.
Shred beef with 2 forks.
In Dutch oven, combine 2 cups cooking liquid, steak sauce, brown sugar and cornstarch mixture.
Bring to a boil; cook and stir 1 to 2 minutes or until slightly thickened.
Add shredded beef; mix well.
Continue to cook until thoroughly heated, stirring occasionally.
Place equal amounts of beef mixture on bottom half of each bun.
Sprinkle with green onions and close with top half of bun.
Serve with additional steak sauce, if desired.
Makes 12 servings (serving size: 1 sandwich).
68fde60a06.pred:
1. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
2. In a large bowl, combine ground beef, onions, garlic, and seasonings. Mix well.
3. Shape the beef mixture into small patties.
4. Heat a pan over medium heat, and cook the patties until they are cooked through, flipping them occasionally.
5. Once the patties are cooked, place them on a baking sheet and bake in the preheated oven for 10-15 minutes, or until they are fully cooked and slightly crispy on the outside.
6. While the patties are baking, prepare the sandwiches by spreading mayonnaise on the bottom halves of the bread slices.
7. Once the patties are done, remove them from the oven and let them cool for a few minutes.
8. Place the cooked patties on the bottom halves of the bread slices, and top them with the remaining bread slices.
9. Cut the sandwiches in half, and serve them immediately.

Enjoy your delicious Half-Time Shredded Beef Sandwiches!

9aa2f06b8e.gt:
To Marinate: Put chicken breasts in a nonporous glass dish or bowl.
Drizzle melted butter or margarine over chicken and season with salt and ground black pepper.
Cover dish and refrigerate overnight.
Preheat oven to 375 degrees F (190 degrees C).
Put potato chip crumbs in a shallow dish or bowl.
Roll chicken in crumbs until well coated, then place in a lightly greased 9x13 inch baking dish.
Bake at 375 degrees F (190 degrees C) for 45 minutes or until chicken juices run clear.
9aa2f06b8e.pred:
As a chef, I would first start by preheating the oven to a high temperature, typically around 450°F (232°C). Next, I would season the chicken with salt, pepper, and any other desired spices. Once the chicken is seasoned, I would place it on a baking sheet and bake it in the preheated oven for about 20-25 minutes, or until the internal temperature reaches 165°F (74°C).

While the chicken is cooking, I would prepare the potato chips. To do this, I would first wash and peel the potatoes, then cut them into thin, evenly sized strips. Next, I would toss the potato chips in a mixture of oil, salt, and any desired seasonings. Once the chicken is cooked, I would remove it from the oven and let it rest for a few minutes before slicing it into even pieces.

Finally, I would arrange the cooked chicken on a serving platter, and then add the potato chips on top. This dish is now ready to be served and enjoyed.

b7680f74ac.gt:
Put the milk, thinly sliced mochi cakes, and soup stock cube in a pan and heat over medium heat until it comes to a boil.
Lower the heat and simmer.
Stir constantly with a rubber spatula to prevent it from burning.
When the sauce has thickened, add the cheese and keep mixing until it's melted.
Cut up the dipping ingredients and boil.
Cut the bread up too.
Transfer to the sauce to a fondue pot or a small earthenware pot, and keep it warm while you enjoy the fondue.
I use a small microwaveable earthenware pot to microwave.
When the sauce cools down, I microwave it again.
b7680f74ac.pred:

1. In a large pot, heat milk over medium heat until it reaches a gentle simmer.

1bdaace83f.gt:

Use white frosting to write the words "Be Mine" on each.

009d0c5350.gt:
Cook macaroni according to box, pour into colander and leave.
DO NOT RINSE>.
Turn burner to med.
Melt butter in pan, add flour and whisk together.
Add milk and whisk constantly till warm and thickened.
Remove from heat.
Whisk in Velveeta, 1 cup cheddar and mozzarella, till melted and smooth.
Add macaroni to cheese mixture.

Heat oven to 350F Pour mac and cheese into 2 qt casserole.

Throughly mix together all ingredients.
Spoon sauce over meatloaf.
Bake for one hour at 350F.

Combine eggs, salt, pepper, nutmeg and parsley.
Mix well Work in the flour and Chavrie by hand to form a smooth consistency Let rest for 10 minutes Meanwhile bring a large pot of salted water to a boil Using a spaetzle press drop dough in boiling water When spaetzle float they are cooked Remove spaetzle with a spider and shock them in cold water.

acfdff90be.gt:
Cut the meat into strips along the grain.
Put the chicken and all the ingredients up to the soy sauce and honey in a bowl and rub in well with your hands.
Leave to marinate for 30 minutes.
After 30 minutes, wipe the excess moisture off the chicken pieces and add 1 tablespoon of cake flour.
That way the batter will stick well to the chicken.
To make the batter: Put the panko in a resealable bag and crush into a fine powder by rolling a rolling pin over the bag.
You can also do this in a food mill or food processor.
Put the crushed panko and the remaining ingredients marked with in a bowl and mix to combine.
Add 250 ml of beer and mix until blended.

Remove from pan and set aside.

Add linguine and cook according to package instructions for al dente.
Drain pasta, reserving about 1/2 cup of pasta water.
Return pasta to the pot and add pesto, the 1/3 cup of remaining peas, and 1/4 cup of the pasta water.
Toss together until pesto adheres to the linguine, adding more pasta water if needed.
Serve immediately, sprinkling with black pepper and additional Parmesan cheese to taste.

Transfer the split peas back into the large pot.

b7d53a2696.gt:
Make the cookie base: Position a rack in the middle of the oven and heat the oven to 350 degrees F. Put the butter in a food processor, along with the flour, light brown sugar, cinnamon, and salt.
Pulse until the mixture is well combined (about 20 pulses).
Scatter the dough into a 9x9-inch baking pan and press it evenly over the bottom.
(Wipe out the processor bowl but don’t bother washing it.)
Bake the base until firm and lightly browned, about 25 minutes.
When the cookie base comes out of the oven, sprinkle the grated chocolate evenly over the top.
(Don’t turn off the oven.)
Set the pan aside.
Make the pecan topping: As the cookie base bakes, pulse the pecans in the food processor until coarsely chopped.
In a medium-size heavy saucepan, melt the butter.
Stir in the dark brown sugar, honey, cream, and salt.
Simmer for 1 minute, stirring occasionally.
Stir in the pecans.
Pour the pecan mixture over the chocolate-sprinkled cookie base, spreading evenly.
Bake until much of the filling is bubbling (not just the edges), 16 to 18 minutes.
Let cool completely in the pan.
When ready to serve, cut into 16 squares.
Tightly covered, these bars will keep for about five days (though they never last that long).

4. Pour the mixture onto the pan, creating a pancake-like shape. Cook for about 5-7 minutes, or until the edges start to curl and the bottom is golden brown.

5. Flip the pancake and cook for an additional 3-5 minutes, or until the bottom is golden brown and the tofu is cooked through.

6. Serve the Healthy Cabbage and Tofu Pancakes hot, garnished with your favorite sauces or toppings.

By following these steps, you can successfully cook the Healthy Cabbage and Tofu Pancakes, creating a delicious and nutritious meal.

60d7ee5f76.gt:
Cover beans with cold water, cover pot and bring to boil.
Reduce heat and simmer for 3 hours, adding water as needed.
In a skillet, slowly brown ground beef.
When crumbly, add onion and saute until limp.
Add to beans along with rest of ingredients except the salt and pepper.
Cover and simmer for three hours or until beans are tender and liquid is somewhat thickened.
Add salt and pepper and serve.

2. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat and simmer for about 30 minutes, or until the beef is cooked through and the beans are tender.
3. Serve the chili beans over a bed of rice or with your favorite side dish.

176a112293.gt:
Dissolve coffee in water; set aside.
In a mixing bowl, combine milk, pudding mix and cinnamon.
Beat on low speed for 2 minutes; stir in coffee.
Fold in whipped topping and spoon into serving dishes.
Garnish with whipped topping if desired.
176a112293.pred:
1. Gather all necessary ingredients:
- 1 cup of milk
- 1/2 cup of granulated sugar
- 1/2 cup of cocoa powder
- 1/2 cup of all-purpose flour
- 1/2 cup of unsalted butter, softened
- 1/2 cup of espresso powder
- 1/2 cup of heavy cream
- 1/2 cup of milk
- 1/2 cup of whipped cream
- 1/2 cup of chocolate sauce
- 1/2 cup of chopped nuts (optional)
- 1/2 cup of grated chocolate (optional)
- 1/2 cup of powdered sugar (optional)

2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the milk, sugar, cocoa powder, flour, and softened butter. Whisk until smooth and well combined.
4. Add the espresso powder, heavy cream, and whipped cream to the mixture. Whisk until smooth and well combined.
5. Pour the mixture into a 9-inch (23cm) square baking dish.
6. Bake the pudding for 30-35 minutes, or until a toothpick inserted into the center comes out clean.
7. Allow the pudding to cool for a few minutes before serving.
8. Optionally, you can sprinkle the top with chopped nuts, grated chocolate, or powdered sugar for added flavor and texture.

Enjoy your delicious Cappuccino Pudding!

e29121a9a8.gt:
In a food processor, puree the avocados with the chickpeas, lemon juice and tahini.
Add the 1/2 cup of oil and puree until smooth; season with salt and pepper.
Transfer the dip to a bowl, drizzle with olive oil and serve with crudites, bread and chips.

1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: avocado, hummus, lemon juice, salt, and pepper.
2. Cut the avocado into small pieces and mash the avocado with a fork or a blender.
3. Add the mashed avocado to a bowl and mix it with the hummus.
4. Squeeze the lemon juice over the avocado-hummus mixture and mix well.
5. Add salt and pepper to taste.
6. Serve the dip immediately or refrigerate it for later use.

9c8b451253.gt:
Combine the potatoes, tomato, carrot, onion, and bay leaves in a slow cooker.
Place the chicken breasts atop the vegetables.
Stir the tomato sauce, chicken broth, and Italian seasoning in a bowl; pour over the chicken breasts.
Add water as needed to assure the chicken is completely covered.
Cook on Low for 6 hours.
Remove the chicken breasts and cut into bite sized chunks and return to slow cooker.
Continue cooking until the vegetables are tender, another 1 to 2 hours.
9c8b451253.pred:
1. First, gather the necessary ingredients: chicken, fresh tomatoes, onions, garlic, vegetable oil, salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer.

2. Preheat your oven to 350°F (175°C).

3. Cut the chicken into bite-sized pieces and season with salt, pepper, and any desired herbs or spices.

4. In a large, oven-safe pot or slow cooker, heat the vegetable oil over medium heat. Add the onions and garlic, and cook until the onions are translucent.

5. Add the chicken to the pot, and cook until it is browned on all sides.

6. Add the fresh tomatoes, and any additional herbs or spices you prefer. Stir to combine.

7. Pour in enough water to cover the chicken and tomatoes. Bring the mixture to a boil, then reduce the heat to low and let it simmer for about 2-3 hours, or until the chicken is cooked through and the sauce has thickened.

8. Serve the stew hot, garnished with fresh herbs or a dollop of sour cream, if desired.

Enjoy your delicious Chicken and Fresh Tomato Slow Cooker Stew!

c1e7a519f3.gt:
Place graham squares, side by side, in single layer in ungreased 15x10x1-inch baking pan.
Microwave caramels and water in microwavable bowl on HIGH 2 to 3 minutes or until caramels are completely melted, stirring after each minute.
Pour over grahams; spread to evenly cover graham squares.
Sprinkle immediately with marshmallows, chocolate and peanuts; press gently into caramel mixture with back of spoon to secure.
Cool completely.
Cut into 24 squares to serve.

78e1fe788f.gt:
Stir together all sauce ingredients in a small bowl.
Heat oil in a 12-inch heavy skillet over moderately high heat until hot but not smoking, then stir-fry garlic and ginger until fragrant, about 30 seconds.
Add shrimp and stir-fry until almost cooked through, about 3 minutes.
Add half of romaine and stir-fry until it begins to wilt, then add remaining romaine and stir-fry until just wilted and shrimp are just cooked through, about 1 minute.
Stir sauce, then add to stir-fry and simmer, stirring, 2 minutes.
78e1fe788f.pred:
[/SYS]

As a chef, I would first start by washing and peeling the shrimp to remove any potential shells or debris. Next, I would cut the shrimp into bite-sized pieces and set them aside.

For the stir-fry, I would start by heating a small amount of oil in a wok or large skillet over medium-high heat. Once the oil is hot, I would add the minced garlic and ginger, stirring constantly until fragrant.

Then, I would add the shrimp pieces and cook them until they are pink and fully cooked through. This usually takes about 2-3 minutes.

After the shrimp is cooked, I would add the romaine lettuce to the wok, stirring to combine with the shrimp. I would cook the romaine until it is slightly wilted, but still crisp.

Next, I would add the cooked noodles to the wok, stirring to combine with the shrimp and romaine. If desired, I would add a splash of soy sauce or a pinch of salt and pepper to enhance the flavor.

Finally, I would serve the stir-fry over a bed of rice or noodles, garnished with a drizzle of soy sauce or a sprinkle of sesame seeds, if desired.

This is a simple and delicious way to prepare a Shrimp and Romaine Stir-Fry, which can be enjoyed as a main course or a side dish.

1832d9054d.gt:
In a medium saucepan over medium heat, toast the barley in 1 tablespoon olive oil for 2 minutes until it is fragrant and nutty.
Add the chicken stock, bring to a boil, reduce heat to a simmer, cover and cook 45 minutes or until most of the liquid is absorbed.
In a large cast iron (or other oven safe) skillet over medium heat, saute the onion and corn kernels in the remaining 1 tablespoon olive oil until onions are slightly softened.
Season with salt and pepper.
Shove the onion and corn to the side of the pan, and add the chorizo into the pan.
Cook the chorizo, breaking it apart as it cooks.
When it is almost browned and cooked through, mix it with the corn and onions then shove the entire mixture to the side.
Create as much open surface on the base of the skillet as possible.
Add the kale, pressing down and turning over until it is wilted.
Season with salt and pepper, then mix it in with the chorizo, corn and onion.
Remove from heat.
Preheat your broiler to high.
Add the cream and 1 cup of cheese into the corn mixture.
Add the cooked barley and mix well.
Spread the entire mixture into an even layer, and top with the panko and remaining cheese.
Place skillet 6 inches under the broiler for 3 minutes until the top is melted and brown.
1832d9054d.pred:
1. Gather all the necessary ingredients: Corn, chorizo, kale, barley, olive oil, salt, pepper, and any additional seasonings you prefer.
2. Preheat your oven to 375°F (190°C).
3. In a large mixing bowl, combine the corn, chorizo, and kale.
4. In a separate small bowl, mix the barley, olive oil, salt, and pepper.
5. Spread the barley mixture evenly over the corn, chorizo, and kale mixture.
6. Transfer the mixture to a baking dish and bake for 25-30 minutes, or until the barley is tender and the corn is cooked through.
7. Remove the dish from the oven and let it cool for a few minutes before serving.
8. Enjoy your delicious Corn, Chorizo & Kale Barley Bake!

[/INST]

36b3caf34c.gt:
Preheat the oven to 325.
In a large enameled cast-iron casserole, heat the peanut oil.
Season the pork with salt and pepper.
Add the shanks to the casserole and cook over moderate heat, turning, until browned all over, about 20 minutes; transfer to a plate.
Add the onion to the casserole and cook over moderate heat, stirring occasionally, until golden, about 4 minutes.
Stir in the water, miso, brown sugar, soy sauce, ginger, garlic, chiles and scallions.
Add the shanks and any juices and bring to a boil.
Cover and braise in the oven for 2 hours, until the pork is very tender.
Garnish with scallions and serve with rice.
36b3caf34c.pred:
1. Preheat the oven to 325°F (163°C).
2. Season the pork shank with salt, pepper, and any additional herbs or spices of your choice.
3. Heat a large pot or Dutch oven over medium heat. Add a little oil, and cook the pork shank until it is browned on all sides. Remove the pork shank from the pot and set aside.
4. Add the remaining oil to the pot, and cook the onions, carrots, and celery until they are softened.
5. Add the garlic and cook for a few seconds, then add the pork shank back into the pot. Pour in the beer, and bring the mixture to a simmer.
6. Cover the pot with a lid, and place it in the preheated oven. Cook the pork shank for about 2-3 hours, or until the meat is tender and falling off the bone.
7. Remove the pork shank from the oven, and let it rest for a few minutes before serving.
8. To make the miso sauce, whisk together the miso paste, soy sauce, and a little bit of water in a small bowl.
9. Serve the braised pork shank with the miso sauce on the side, allowing the diners to add as much sauce as they desire.

Enjoy your delicious Braised Pork Shank with Miso!

94d70d2bcc.gt:
Wash, dry, and cut broccolini into thirds.
Heat oil over high in a wok or similar type pan.
Stir fry the stems first for about 3-4 minutes.
You may need to turn the heat down to medium high.
Add the top leaf portion, and cook for another 3-4 minutes.
Shut off heat and add oyster sauce, stirring to coat.
Serve.

a040895990.gt:
Preheat oven to 325 degrees.
Mix together all ingredients except olive oil and garlic.
Place olive oil in the bottom of a casserole dish or square glass baking dish.
Rub the dish with one bulb of chopped garlic and leave the garlic in the dish.
Pour mixture into baking dish and bake for 30-40 minutes at 325 degrees.
a040895990.pred:
To cook the Green Rice Casserole, follow these steps:

ea87319f86.gt:
Roast the eggplant directly over a gas flame, turning occasionally, until charred all over and soft, about 12 minutes.
Transfer to a colander and let cool slightly, then peel and let cool completely.
Meanwhile, in a medium saucepan, cook the garlic in the oil over moderate heat until sizzling, about 2 minutes.
Remove from the heat and whisk in the vinegar, honey, rosemary, oregano and minced parsley.
Season the vinaigrette generously with salt and pepper.
Heat a large cast-iron skillet.
In batches if necessary, add the piquillos to the skillet in an even layer.
Cook over high heat, turning once, until lightly charred on both sides, about 2 minutes total.
Add the piquillos to the warm vinaigrette and let cool completely.
In a food processor, combine the eggplant with both cheeses and puree until smooth.
Scrape into a bowl and season with salt and pepper.
Spread the whipped eggplant on toasts and, using a slotted spoon, spoon some of the marinated piquillos on top.
Garnish with chopped parsley and serve with anchovies.

- Slice the eggplant into thin rounds, and then whip the eggplant with a fork until it reaches a smooth, creamy consistency.

3. Serve and enjoy:
- Serve the toasts as a snack or appetizer, or as part of a larger meal.

By following these steps, you can prepare a delicious and visually appealing meal using the ingredients shown in the image.

57e41370a3.gt:
Combine flour, baking powder, nutmeg, and salt in one bowl.
In another bow, beat egg yolks slightly.
Beat in milk, bananas, and oil.
Add egg mixture to flour mixture all at once.
Stir just till combined but still slightly lumpy.
In small bowl, beat egg whites until stiff peaks form.
Gently fold beaten egg whites into flour mixture, leaving a few puffs of egg white.
Do not overmix!
Pour batter onto pre-heated, lightly greased waffle maker.
Bake waffles according to manufacturer's directions.
Serve hot and fresh.
I topped mine with butter and syrup, and they were delicious!
57e41370a3.pred:
To prepare the meal shown in the image, follow these steps:

1. Preheat the waffle iron: Place the waffle iron on a heat-resistant surface and preheat it according to the manufacturer's instructions.

2. Prepare the ingredients: In a large mixing bowl, combine the following ingredients:
- 1 ripe banana, mashed
- 1 cup whole wheat flour
- 1/2 cup milk
- 1 egg
- 1/2 teaspoon baking powder
- 1/2 teaspoon salt
- 1/4 teaspoon cinnamon
- 1/4 teaspoon nutmeg
- 1/4 teaspoon allspice
- 1/4 cup honey

3. Mix the ingredients: Combine the mashed banana, milk, egg, and dry ingredients in the large mixing bowl. Mix until well combined.

4. Cook the waffles: Pour the batter onto the preheated waffle iron, using a ladle or a spoon. Cook according to the manufacturer's instructions, typically until the waffles are golden brown and cooked through.

5. Serve: Once the waffles are cooked, remove them from the waffle iron and serve them on a plate. You can enjoy them with butter, syrup, or any other desired toppings.

By following these steps, you can prepare delicious Banana-Wheat Waffles, which are a popular breakfast or brunch dish.

remove from oven).

8c32c6a022.gt:
Make the dough.
Put all the dough ingredients except for the olive oil into a plastic bag, and knead it well to make the dough.
When the dough comes together, add the olive oil and keep kneading (10 minutes).
Leave it to rise in the bag (30 minutes).
When the dough has risen, press it down lightly to deflate.
Place it on a kitchen parchment paper lined oven tray and leave to rest for 10 minutes.
Cut up the toppings for the pizza crust.
Slice the sausages diagonally.
Slice the onion and cherry tomatoes.
Defrost the seafood mix.
Put olive oil on your hands, and spread the dough out to cover the oven tray.
Preheat the oven to 300C (or 250C if your oven doesn't get that hot).
Spread the dough with pizza sauce, and cover evenly with toppings of your choice.
Add the pizza cheese to finish.
Bake at 300C for 13 minutes.
Top with something like fresh basil leaves and cut into 8 portions.
It's very hot so be careful.

You won't get bored with the toppings this way, and looks like fun too.
8c32c6a022.pred:
To cook the mystery dish, which is a pizza, follow these steps:

2. Prepare your pizza dough by rolling it out on a floured surface until it reaches your desired thickness.
3. Spread a layer of tomato sauce evenly over the dough, leaving a small border around the edges for the crust.

Brush oil on crust.
Top crust with sauce and artichokes.
Sprinkle with soy mozzarella, goat cheese and sun-dried tomatoes.

Fill with remaining ingredients.
